tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was Happy, healthy & joyful Journey of myself & baby after we started consulting madam,
We had blessed with HEALTHY & BABY Girl (by C-section) on 13th-August-2023 , 11 a.m.  in Motherhood Hospital, Sarjapur Road, Bangalore,
We couple acknowledge Heartly thankful to Dr SANGEETHA GOMES madam & entire CARE CLINIC/Motherhood staff,
This was my 2nd baby delivery pregnancy handled by Dr. Sangeetha, first one was Baby Boy delivered on 26th May 2017 with High-risk Pregnancy for "Complete placenta previa" as well handled by Dr. Sangeetha which was boosting factor.
 The second Baby pregnancy has Preterm delivery by 34 weeks due to complications in Intrauterine growth restriction (IUGR):  the rate of fetal growth that is below normal in light of the growth due to lack nutrients & gas are not exchanging with mother placenta & baby , my baby was 1.360 Kg instead of 2 kg for 34 weeks, Dr. Sangeetha was keen in monitoring from 5 moths NT scan, giving required treatment(Early Lungs development injection)but due to IUGR , madam given detail information if baby is not deliver in 34 weeks & side effects aswell as per constant drop in Amniotic Fluids from 13.8 to 8.4 in last 3 weeks, Since we had lot of confidence on Dr. Sangeetha with previous good experience and gone to preterm delivery to avoid further complication to baby & mother.
Dr. Sangeetha & Team has handled deliver with smoothly & After birth Baby was to be in NICU for 2 weeks as its was preterm, later Baby discharged when she was able cope with basic needs of life, 
we are thankful Dr. Sangeetha & entire pediatric Team of Motherhood including (Dr Prashanth Gowda, Dr. Shalini Addalur & Dr. Sushma) had taken care of my baby without any flaws, Initially  it was estimated 3 to 4 weeks stay in NICU  due to preterm delivery, baby weight & other support required to baby, But  some miracle happened in 12 days, Baby was responding well for incremental pediatric treatment, After 2 weeks in NICU baby was performing normal and discharged  to home later 2 days of monitoring in general ward.
We would strongly recommend Dr SANGEETHA GOMES for any obstetrics and gynecology related issues (from Infertility to HIGH RISK PREGENANCY (especially)), reasons are as mentioned below:
1) Both of my kids Delivery has High Risk pregnancy was confidently handled by Dr. Sangeetha Madam & Staff of Care clinic/Motherhood
2) Three of my family friends (Mr. Vinay, Mr. Vijay, Mr. Shivashankar) I had referred to Dr. Sangeetha madam on pregnancy treatment, are happy with Healthy & joyful baby delivery in motherhood hospital last 2 years are happy with medical services provided by madam

Once again ‚ÄúWE are THANKFUL to Dr. SANGEETHA GOMES madam & entire CARE CLINC/Motherhood Staff :-)   
Kudos to "Entire team of Dr. Sangeetha Gomes (Gynecology) & Dr. Prashant Gowda, DR. NICU team (pediatric team)", Keep up Good Medical Services to the society üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I contacted Sangeetha mam for my pregnancy treatment. This was my first pregnancy and we were sceptical about whom to go to for checkup and further treatment. Fortunately we found Sangeetha mam. She is someone with lots of experience and very practical in her approach. She is very accurate in  understanding the issue. My entire pregnancy journey was smooth without any hiccups. Around 36th week of my pregnancy, I had severe itching and contacted mam immediately. Went through a growth scan and it was figured out that my amniotic fluid is borderline. Mam suggested two injections for lung maturity of baby on the consecutive days and my delivery was scheduled on the third day. I was induced at around 09:30 pm and delivered my baby boy at 04:03 am (That was a super quick delivery IMO. Her diet and exercises helped a lot here). Mam was following up with duty doctor periodically with duty doctor and she even arrived at the hospital in those early hours. After delivery, I moved to my hometown and suffered from mild pains with episiotomy. Mam followed up with me on phone, took a detailed analysis and suggested treatment which again is accurate and I was able to recover within two days. 

I took 6 months of time to write this review as my baby boy weighed only 2.44 kg at the time of birth and I wanted to make sure everything is fine before writing review. Now, he is a happy little one meeting all his milestones and on track with birth weight chart.

So, overall it's a very positive experience with her and she is also mom-approved doctor. Her multi lingual proficiency needs a special mention.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
A Thank you note to *** **** *** wonderful Doctor Sangeeta Gomes.

During my Annual health check I got to know that I have ovarian cysts which is growing and it is almost 12cm, I have panicked until I saw Dr. Sangeeta Gomes, who made me feel better, she told me not to worry, I am there and nothing to worry as cysts are common, she suggested MRI test and even in MRI cyst size didn‚Äôt change, it was a nightmare, I had lots of negative thoughts in my mind. Dr. suggested that I have to go for a Laparoscopic surgery to remove that, I knew I was in safe hand ** *** **** ******* Post-Surgery I was really worried waiting for biopsy report and when I saw you next day, you told me 110% everything is normal and biopsy is just a hospital procedure I wanted to hug you and you allowed me to do which made me feel relaxed as there was lot running in my mind these 3 weeks and your message came yesterday after the report that report is Normal.

Thanks would be a small word for you Doctor who made me realize there is still "humanity" and "service" exist in this mechanical world.

Your art of healing along with humbleness has made me wonder how simple humans be with so much real talent****** *** * **** ************ **** *** *********** ** *****

 

     Yes I had known Dr. Sangeeta for a very long time, almost 7 years. I still remember the day I first met her (she is my go to Doctor since then for all my Health Problems), I was having high fever and hospitalized at St. Johnes for almost two days when I went  home after two-days fever didn‚Äôt go away, one of my neighbors suggested there is a good Gynecologist why don‚Äôt I see her once, I told her I was not married, why would I see Gyne for this fever, she told me you just meet her once as she is also a general physician. In the evening I went to her HSR Clinic and met Dr. Sangeeta, she examined me and took some history and suggested a few medicines and told me, my fever should come down within 24hrs and next 48hrs you should be ok and I was ok. Fever didn‚Äôt come back at all after that.

  4 months later I got married and I got pregnant after 6 months of my marriage. When I got pregnant, I knew I Doctor already and I didn‚Äôt have to look for another Doctor as by this I had gotten very good feedback about Doctor Sangeeta including my experience. During my entire pregnancy I was so relaxed. Doctor made me so comfortable and I didn‚Äôt have to worry abt anything I had low placenta and she guided me through entire my pregnancy, each time I went for checkup she made me feel so good with her beautiful smile on her face. She sent me to St. Philomena for delivery I wondered why when cloud 9 is close to me but later I realized it was a best decision Dr. Sangeeta took as I was being taken care so well, including arranging a expert Doctor for guiding me how to breastfeed when I was struggling to feed. 

    Doctor Sangeeta not only be with us during entire Delivery period or a surgery but she also guide us through our recovery. You just have to call the clinic number and leave message and she will guide us over a message. She may call back only if it is necessary else she will respond to your message , I understand she is busy and most beautiful thing about her she will respond to message

tags: None
review:
I have visited many Gynaecologists in Bangalore for about 5 years without any success. After 5 years of various treatment and one failed IUI we have almost lot hope of divine blessing. Then one of our fried suggested about Dr.  Sangeetha Gomes of ‚ÄúCare Clinic‚Äù in HSR Layout Bangalore. By this time we have decided to go for IVF after lots of research.
 In the first visit to care clinic (Dr. Santgeetha Gomes) we decided to go ahead with IVF treatment and doctor also rightly suggested not to waste too much time on different treatment and medicines. Dr. Sangeetha Gomes is very humble and cleared all out doubts without getting irritated by the silly questions. And explained all pros and cons of the treatment, cost associated with the treatment etc. 
For egg collection and transfer process we are advised to meet Dr. Manjunath from NOVA. It was great to meet another humble and caring doctor. Both the doctors (Dr. Sangeetha Gomes and Dr. Manjunath) took care of all the process and treatment very well. Facilities and support staff at NOVA also was very good. Finally egg collection day came and we were happy that 18 eggs were collected, but after 2 weeks we came to know that out of 18 only 2 were grown as embryo. By the gods grace and proper care / treatments by the doctors, out of the 2 embryos one was successful. We were luckiest as only 2 embryos were there and it was successful as there was no chance for 2nd transfer. 
Pregnancy care after this are ‚ÄúCare Clinic‚Äù was at its best. Dr. Sangeetha Gomes has advised us on each steps to be taken care of. We generally used to barge in to clinic to ask some silly doubts due to the tension of precious pregnancy, but Dr. Sangeetha Gomes cleared all our doubts properly without any hesitation. 9 months journey was very smooth under the consultation of Dr. Sangeetha Gomes. Support staff of the care clinic also were really good. 
We have selected motherhood hospital Sarjapur Road for the big day. It was grand welcome for the little one and all in the family were on cloud nine. Dr. Sangeetha has arrived on time for the delivery, regularly visited us and advised duty doctor / support staff very well.  
Experience at ‚ÄúMotherhood Hospital‚Äù was very enriching throughout the delivery process and stay till discharge. Services in all departments of hospital was very good including admin and billing / insurance. Nursing staff has taken care of baby very well, even in the midnight also we can see the smiling face. 
Thanks to Dr. Sangeetha Gomes / Dr. Manjunath and Motherhood team. I strongly recommend Dr. Sangeetha Gomes if you are planning for pregnancy or for treatment for infertility.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Family Planning,
review:
A year ago we had relocated to Sarjapur area and were in search of good gynaecologist and hospital to get help. Since Motherhood hospital was very close to our house we started researching about the hospital and found it quite good (based on reviews). For selecting the doctor, we took some time. We read all the reviews and after a lot of deliberation we decide to visit Dr. Sangeeta Gomes. And I MUST say that was the best decision we made. Since it is very easy to get misguided in this sensitive issue of ‚Äòplanning for a family‚Äô, it becomes necessary to get a right kind of doctor and Dr. Gomes is a wonderful doctor. We visited Dr. Gomes in the month of July ‚Äô19 for pre-pregnancy check-ups wherein she asked us to undergo a list of tests (which was fair too). When she found out that my fertility rate was very low, she right away suggested some treatments after giving proper counselling. We must say that the doctor has very very positive vibes with very practical attitude. She makes everything sounds doable. However, in our case she turned out to be our ‚Äòlucky charm‚Äô. Because after visiting her the next month itself I got conceived all naturally. So, for us she is a lucky mascot. Since then she is our DOCTOR. During the entire pregnancy she gave us right kind of advice and if there was something concerning instead of panicking, she would immediately suggest next steps. We love our consultation sessions which used to be not more than 5 minutes but gave us so much relief (and good laughter sometimes). We always felt she is a very cool doctor who can lighten the whole situation with her style of consulting. I delivered my baby girl during lock-down (April‚Äô20) through caesareans delivery (we had decided to go for surgery instead of normal delivery to avoid any risk during this outbreak. Doctor had properly explained to us that C-section is not a bad option and there is no risk too.). We must say that those 9 months went by very smooth and we thank her for every bit. She never suggests any unnecessary tests or medicines. I used to go with list of questions, and she would answer them all. We really recommend DR Sangeeta Gomes and we suggest to at least meet her once. 

About the hospital, we have only good things to talk about just like DR Gomes. Very polite staff and very well managed facility. We have never experienced any chaos or never had any trouble throughout. The nursing staff at the hospital is fantastic and have been very patient with us post-delivery. They extended their support in everything and we really like to thank them specifically (nursing staff at second floor). We certainly recommended Motherhood Sarjapur hospital to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We were blessed with a baby Girl on 22/04/2019, we have started consulted Dr. Sangeetha Gomes in 2017 after one of our family friend (From our Apartment) has recommended to check with her as they also got benefited with her consultancy and blessed with the Baby Boy, 
Prior to consulting with DR. Sangeetha, we have consulted more than 3 other doctors in recognized hospitals of Bangalore. We have wasted 3+ years of time, energy and money with these Gynecologist, where every time we just get confirmation of next appointments dates and medicals bills. Among Three Dr.s One Dr. has referred to another Dr. after 1.5 years of consultancy, we never gone there again. And because of one dr.‚Äôs tremens my wife‚Äôs lungs filled with water. We almost most lost trust on any Dr.
Then our journey started with Dr. Sangeetha Gomes in July 2017 and in the 1st visit itself we realized that we can trust this Dr. and we were not wrong about this realization and my wife conceived within 4 months of her treatments, completely natural pregnancy, unfortunately it didn‚Äôt go well and no heartbeats heard from 1st pregnancy.
Next Good News came after 1 year in Aug 2018 and we are very happy with complete duration of treatment and delivery went well and blessed with little angle.
These 2 years have been really smooth under the consultation of Dr. Sangeetha Gomes. She is very patient and humble, and listens to you calmly unlike the other doctors who are on a rush to consult the waiting patients. We meet her at her clinic as well as Motherhood hospital from the very beginning of our pre-pregnancy and pregnancy. She gave very detailed advice at every stage, her staff was also very supportive and responsive all the time. And she always recommends natural remedies whenever required. She treats you as well-known person I was always surprise to see that she recalls all the medical history without seeing the files despites of many patients.
This was our 2nd Pregnancy, we were guided by Dr. Sangeetha Gomes at each phase. She handled our case very sensitively. We faced some issues like cough, cold and fevers and also an accidental Water burns in 8th month and we were very scared but, she did everything that can be done by her by regular checkup, Scans, Hb Tests, TSH Test, Blood Sugar Test and other necessary Tests like NST was done regularly to monitor heart rate of Baby - all reports were normal. 
We opted Mother Hood Hospital. Dr. has given dates in 38th week where my wife has admitted in the hospital and same day delivery happened in the morning. My wife delivered our baby Girl on 22nd April 2019 and got discharged on 24th April 2019. She used to help her with all our worries/queries and being transparent in diagnosing her which helped us to build trust on her. She had also helped us in post-Pregnancy with proper advice and Medications. I gained almost 12 kgs. And was able to complete my term in 38 weeks and my daughter was born healthy and she is doing well. 
I would highly recommend her for anyone who is planning pregnancy or for all kind of gynecology related consultancy..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We are originally from West Bengal and moved to Bangalore for work. Around a year into our marriage, my wife encountered health issues‚Äîvaginal infections and irregular periods‚Äîleading us to seek medical assistance. Initially, we consulted a doctor who, despite treating her, lacked warmth and delivered distressing news: suggesting that a normal pregnancy might be challenging and advocating for IVF due to an underlying issue.

Devastatingly, after conceiving naturally back in our hometown, we faced a miscarriage at two months into the pregnancy. This loss left us deeply disheartened. However, upon returning to Bangalore and seeking a second opinion, we were fortunate to learn about Sangeeta Mam through a colleague at my workplace.

Sangeeta Mam's approach was a game-changer. Her empathetic demeanor and reassurance filled us with hope. Instead of discouragement, she offered encouragement, sharing her own experiences and stories of other couples who had overcome similar challenges. Under her guidance and care, my wife underwent a tailored treatment plan.

What struck us most was Mam's ability to transform the atmosphere in her office. Couples, initially weighed down by sadness, left her room with smiles, having found comfort, positivity, and renewed hope.

After six months of dedicated care under Mam's guidance, we returned to West Bengal. And thanks to Mam's expertise, my wife successfully delivered our first child‚Äîa beautiful baby boy. Sangeeta Mam's consultations were not just medical but also deeply personal and uplifting. Her unwavering support made our journey to parenthood a fulfilling and joyful one.

For anyone facing similar challenges, we wholeheartedly recommend Sangeeta Mam's expert care. You'll not only receive exceptional medical guidance but also find solace and optimism in her compassionate approach.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy care and management,
review:
I cannot express enough gratitude and admiration for the remarkable care and support that Dr. Sangeeta Gomes provided during the delivery of our second child, a beautiful baby boy. From the very first visit to her clinic, my wife felt confident in her abilities, and our experience throughout the pregnancy and childbirth journey was nothing short of exceptional.

She possesses an extraordinary blend of expertise, compassion, and a reassuring demeanor that instantly put us at ease. She took the time to thoroughly explain every aspect of the pregnancy, addressing our concerns and ensuring that we were well-informed and comfortable with every decision. Her approachable nature and willingness to answer even the smallest of questions made us feel valued and cared for throughout the entire process.

During labor and delivery, Dr.Sangeeta Gomes showcased her unwavering dedication to her patients. Her calm and composed demeanor instilled a sense of confidence in us, assuring us that we were in capable hands. Her skillful guidance and expertise were evident as she navigated through the challenges of childbirth with grace and precision. She maintained open communication with my wife, ensuring that her comfort and well-being were always the top priority.

What truly sets Dr. Sangeeta Gomes apart is her genuine empathy and compassion. She understands the emotional rollercoaster that pregnancy and childbirth can be and provides not only medical support but also emotional support. Her warm and caring approach created a supportive environment that made the entire experience more manageable for my wife and me.

Today, as we hold our precious baby boy in our arms, we are profoundly grateful to Dr. Sangeeta Gomes for her extraordinary care and expertise. Her commitment to excellence in the field of gynecology and obstetrics is evident in every aspect of her practice. We wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Sangeeta Gomes to anyone seeking top-notch healthcare and support during their pregnancy and childbirth journey.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I don't know how I should start with my story and how this doctor came into my life all of a sudden just like an angel and saved me* ** *** ***** *** ** **** * **** ** ** who came in at a very critical stage of my pregnancy.

I was 7 weeks pregnant and was initially seeing another doctor. Somehow I felt, I was being mislead by my previous doctor. Cutting the long story short, finally I came across an undesirable miscarriage. while announcing the miscarriage upon an ultrasound at the doctor's clinic, the previous doctor tagged my pregnancy as a scar ectopic pregnancy which was earlier never established in my previous scans. I was also told that there was abundant vascularity in and around my uterus for which is why I should go for a Intrasac Methotrate process for abortion. Somehow I was not convinced with this advise and felt this could be life-threatening. 

Immediately  I decided to go for a second opinion. I went to doctor  Sangeet Gomes( found on Google with great reviews) the same evening with all my medical papers. There was a huge queue. However, looking at my condition, she agreed to see me at the earliest. She was super diligent in looking at my history and with her level of knowledge , genuinity and expertise, she could immediately instill confidence in me as a doctor. I got really good vibes from that very moment and requested her to take up my case entirely and treat myself accordingly. She was gracious enough to guide me the best possible way with proper and systematic investigation and medical steps in place. Finally at a very reasonable cost she took me through a Suction and Evacuation process at Manipal Hospital where she ensured I get the right and absolute care. She herself visited me and called up multiple times to check on my status while I was admitted. She did the procedure with amazing backup plans and preparations in place to ensure my physical safety. I am truly humbled by her gesture as a doctor. Even now after two months of my abortion, I still get calls from Care clinic to check on my health and wellbeing. I am deeply indebted to doctor Sangeeta Gomes for being there with me like a " caring mother" if not more.  Thank you doctor. Best regards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was searching for good gynaecologist in Bangalore through website I found Dr Sangeetha gomes and met her at Care clinic. I was bit worried on getting pregnant as we planned to have little one after three years of our marriage. I had a PCOD problem with that i was so disappointed to concieve. But after visiting Dr Sangeetha gomes she supported me very well, and guided me with very friendly manner.

 After taking 4 months of treatment. FInally the day has came that i was conceived on july 2017. The pregnancy stage went smooth.She prescribed only the required tests and medicines and always guided whenever i have any query. I started getting regular call from the clinic regarding update on my health condition. She is very much experienced and understands your problem quickly,analyses the root causes. She will advice and explains everything in detail with patience. She doesn't make you go through unneccesary scans unless needed. Staff of the "care clinic" taken me very care.

We have selected Motherhood hospital Sarjapur for the bigday . Suddenly i started getting pains. I intimated to hospital. She called to motherhood hospital, when i reached to hospital everyone was ready to take care for my delivery. Dr. sangeetha Gomes has arrived on time for the delivery. Duty Dr. and nurses taken me very care. 1hr of continues labour pains, finally...

On 8th March 2018, I am blessed with cute little baby boy with "NORMAL DELIVERY". When i am getting pains she supports me very well and she encourages me to deliver normally. She allowed my mother when i am getting pains in labour room for supporting me. It was grand welcome for the little one and all in the family were on cloud nine.

After delivery she suggested me to take HPV vaccination. Post- pregnancy also, i am getting regular call from care clinic to know about mine and baby health.

Experience at ‚ÄúMotherhood Hospital‚Äù was very enriching throughout the delivery process and stay till discharge. Services in all departments of hospital was very good including admin and billing / insurance. Nursing staff has taken care of baby very well, even in the midnight also we can see the smiling face.

Thanks to Dr. Sangeetha Gomes ,staff of care clinic and Motherhood team. I strongly recommend Dr. Sangeetha Gomes if you are planning for pregnancy or  infertility treatments.

I always refer her to everyone. I always got a motherly care from her. 

Thanks alot Doctor for everything.

And explained all pros and cons of the treatment, cost associated with the treatment etc. 
For egg collection and transfer process we are advised to meet Dr. Manjunath from NOVA. It was great to meet another humble and caring doctor. Both the doctors (Dr. Sangeetha Gomes and Dr. Manjunath) took care of all the process and treatment very well. Facilities and support staff at NOVA also was very good. Finally egg collection day came and we were happy that 18 eggs were collected, but after 2 weeks we came to know that out of 18 only 2 were grown as embryo. By the gods grace and proper care / treatments by the doctors, out of the 2 embryos one was successful. We were luckiest as only 2 embryos were there and it was successful as there was no chance for 2nd transfer. 
Pregnancy care after this are ‚ÄúCare Clinic‚Äù was at its best. Dr. Sangeetha Gomes has advised us on each steps to be taken care of. We generally used to barge in to clinic to ask some silly doubts due to the tension of precious pregnancy, but Dr. Sangeetha Gomes cleared all our doubts properly without any hesitation. 9 months journey was very smooth under the consultation of Dr. Sangeetha Gomes. Support staff of the care clinic also were really good. 
We have selected motherhood hospital Sarjapur Road for the big day. It was grand welcome for the little one and all in the family were on cloud nine. Dr. Sangeetha has arrived on time for the delivery, regularly visited us and advised duty doctor / support staff very well.  
Experience at ‚ÄúMotherhood Hospital‚Äù was very enriching throughout the delivery process and stay till discharge. Services in all departments of hospital was very good including admin and billing / insurance. Nursing staff has taken care of baby very well, even in the midnight also we can see the smiling face. 
Thanks to Dr. Sangeetha Gomes / Dr. Manjunath and Motherhood team. I strongly recommend Dr. Sangeetha Gomes if you are planning for pregnancy or for treatment for infertility.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Family Planning,
review:
A year ago we had relocated to Sarjapur area and were in search of good gynaecologist and hospital to get help. Since Motherhood hospital was very close to our house we started researching about the hospital and found it quite good (based on reviews). For selecting the doctor, we took some time. We read all the reviews and after a lot of deliberation we decide to visit Dr. Sangeeta Gomes. And I MUST say that was the best decision we made. Since it is very easy to get misguided in this sensitive issue of ‚Äòplanning for a family‚Äô, it becomes necessary to get a right kind of doctor and Dr. Gomes is a wonderful doctor. We visited Dr. Gomes in the month of July ‚Äô19 for pre-pregnancy check-ups wherein she asked us to undergo a list of tests (which was fair too). When she found out that my fertility rate was very low, she right away suggested some treatments after giving proper counselling. We must say that the doctor has very very positive vibes with very practical attitude. She makes everything sounds doable. However, in our case she turned out to be our ‚Äòlucky charm‚Äô. Because after visiting her the next month itself I got conceived all naturally. So, for us she is a lucky mascot. Since then she is our DOCTOR. During the entire pregnancy she gave us right kind of advice and if there was something concerning instead of panicking, she would immediately suggest next steps. We love our consultation sessions which used to be not more than 5 minutes but gave us so much relief (and good laughter sometimes). We always felt she is a very cool doctor who can lighten the whole situation with her style of consulting. I delivered my baby girl during lock-down (April‚Äô20) through caesareans delivery (we had decided to go for surgery instead of normal delivery to avoid any risk during this outbreak. Doctor had properly explained to us that C-section is not a bad option and there is no risk too.). We must say that those 9 months went by very smooth and we thank her for every bit. She never suggests any unnecessary tests or medicines. I used to go with list of questions, and she would answer them all. We really recommend DR Sangeeta Gomes and we suggest to at least meet her once. 

About the hospital, we have only good things to talk about just like DR Gomes. Very polite staff and very well managed facility. We have never experienced any chaos or never had any trouble throughout. The nursing staff at the hospital is fantastic and have been very patient with us post-delivery. They extended their support in everything and we really like to thank them specifically (nursing staff at second floor). We certainly recommended Motherhood Sarjapur hospital to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We were blessed with a baby Girl on 22/04/2019, we have started consulted Dr. Sangeetha Gomes in 2017 after one of our family friend (From our Apartment) has recommended to check with her as they also got benefited with her consultancy and blessed with the Baby Boy, 
Prior to consulting with DR. Sangeetha, we have consulted more than 3 other doctors in recognized hospitals of Bangalore. We have wasted 3+ years of time, energy and money with these Gynecologist, where every time we just get confirmation of next appointments dates and medicals bills. Among Three Dr.s One Dr. has referred to another Dr. after 1.5 years of consultancy, we never gone there again. And because of one dr.‚Äôs tremens my wife‚Äôs lungs filled with water. We almost most lost trust on any Dr.
Then our journey started with Dr. Sangeetha Gomes in July 2017 and in the 1st visit itself we realized that we can trust this Dr. and we were not wrong about this realization and my wife conceived within 4 months of her treatments, completely natural pregnancy, unfortunately it didn‚Äôt go well and no heartbeats heard from 1st pregnancy.
Next Good News came after 1 year in Aug 2018 and we are very happy with complete duration of treatment and delivery went well and blessed with little angle.
These 2 years have been really smooth under the consultation of Dr. Sangeetha Gomes. She is very patient and humble, and listens to you calmly unlike the other doctors who are on a rush to consult the waiting patients. We meet her at her clinic as well as Motherhood hospital from the very beginning of our pre-pregnancy and pregnancy. She gave very detailed advice at every stage, her staff was also very supportive and responsive all the time. And she always recommends natural remedies whenever required. She treats you as well-known person I was always surprise to see that she recalls all the medical history without seeing the files despites of many patients.
This was our 2nd Pregnancy, we were guided by Dr. Sangeetha Gomes at each phase. She handled our case very sensitively. We faced some issues like cough, cold and fevers and also an accidental Water burns in 8th month and we were very scared but, she did everything that can be done by her by regular checkup, Scans, Hb Tests, TSH Test, Blood Sugar Test and other necessary Tests like NST was done regularly to monitor heart rate of Baby - all reports were normal. 
We opted Mother Hood Hospital. Dr. has given dates in 38th week where my wife has admitted in the hospital and same day delivery happened in the morning. My wife delivered our baby Girl on 22nd April 2019 and got discharged on 24th April 2019. She used to help her with all our worries/queries and being transparent in diagnosing her which helped us to build trust on her. She had also helped us in post-Pregnancy with proper advice and Medications. I gained almost 12 kgs. And was able to complete my term in 38 weeks and my daughter was born healthy and she is doing well. 
I would highly recommend her for anyone who is planning pregnancy or for all kind of gynecology related consultancy..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We are originally from West Bengal and moved to Bangalore for work. Around a year into our marriage, my wife encountered health issues‚Äîvaginal infections and irregular periods‚Äîleading us to seek medical assistance. Initially, we consulted a doctor who, despite treating her, lacked warmth and delivered distressing news: suggesting that a normal pregnancy might be challenging and advocating for IVF due to an underlying issue.

Devastatingly, after conceiving naturally back in our hometown, we faced a miscarriage at two months into the pregnancy. This loss left us deeply disheartened. However, upon returning to Bangalore and seeking a second opinion, we were fortunate to learn about Sangeeta Mam through a colleague at my workplace.

Sangeeta Mam's approach was a game-changer. Her empathetic demeanor and reassurance filled us with hope. Instead of discouragement, she offered encouragement, sharing her own experiences and stories of other couples who had overcome similar challenges. Under her guidance and care, my wife underwent a tailored treatment plan.

What struck us most was Mam's ability to transform the atmosphere in her office. Couples, initially weighed down by sadness, left her room with smiles, having found comfort, positivity, and renewed hope.

After six months of dedicated care under Mam's guidance, we returned to West Bengal. And thanks to Mam's expertise, my wife successfully delivered our first child‚Äîa beautiful baby boy. Sangeeta Mam's consultations were not just medical but also deeply personal and uplifting. Her unwavering support made our journey to parenthood a fulfilling and joyful one.

For anyone facing similar challenges, we wholeheartedly recommend Sangeeta Mam's expert care. You'll not only receive exceptional medical guidance but also find solace and optimism in her compassionate approach.

review:
I cannot express enough gratitude and admiration for the remarkable care and support that Dr. Sangeeta Gomes provided during the delivery of our second child, a beautiful baby boy. From the very first visit to her clinic, my wife felt confident in her abilities, and our experience throughout the pregnancy and childbirth journey was nothing short of exceptional.

She possesses an extraordinary blend of expertise, compassion, and a reassuring demeanor that instantly put us at ease. She took the time to thoroughly explain every aspect of the pregnancy, addressing our concerns and ensuring that we were well-informed and comfortable with every decision. Her approachable nature and willingness to answer even the smallest of questions made us feel valued and cared for throughout the entire process.

During labor and delivery, Dr.Sangeeta Gomes showcased her unwavering dedication to her patients. Her calm and composed demeanor instilled a sense of confidence in us, assuring us that we were in capable hands. Her skillful guidance and expertise were evident as she navigated through the challenges of childbirth with grace and precision. She maintained open communication with my wife, ensuring that her comfort and well-being were always the top priority.

What truly sets Dr. Sangeeta Gomes apart is her genuine empathy and compassion. She understands the emotional rollercoaster that pregnancy and childbirth can be and provides not only medical support but also emotional support. Her warm and caring approach created a supportive environment that made the entire experience more manageable for my wife and me.

Today, as we hold our precious baby boy in our arms, we are profoundly grateful to Dr. Sangeeta Gomes for her extraordinary care and expertise. Her commitment to excellence in the field of gynecology and obstetrics is evident in every aspect of her practice. We wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Sangeeta Gomes to anyone seeking top-notch healthcare and support during their pregnancy and childbirth journey.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I don't know how I should start with my story and how this doctor came into my life all of a sudden just like an angel and saved me* ** *** ***** *** ** **** * **** ** ** who came in at a very critical stage of my pregnancy.

I was 7 weeks pregnant and was initially seeing another doctor. Somehow I felt, I was being mislead by my previous doctor. Cutting the long story short, finally I came across an undesirable miscarriage. while announcing the miscarriage upon an ultrasound at the doctor's clinic, the previous doctor tagged my pregnancy as a scar ectopic pregnancy which was earlier never established in my previous scans. I was also told that there was abundant vascularity in and around my uterus for which is why I should go for a Intrasac Methotrate process for abortion. Somehow I was not convinced with this advise and felt this could be life-threatening. 

Immediately  I decided to go for a second opinion. I went to doctor  Sangeet Gomes( found on Google with great reviews) the same evening with all my medical papers. There was a huge queue. However, looking at my condition, she agreed to see me at the earliest. She was super diligent in looking at my history and with her level of knowledge , genuinity and expertise, she could immediately instill confidence in me as a doctor. I got really good vibes from that very moment and requested her to take up my case entirely and treat myself accordingly. She was gracious enough to guide me the best possible way with proper and systematic investigation and medical steps in place. Finally at a very reasonable cost she took me through a Suction and Evacuation process at Manipal Hospital where she ensured I get the right and absolute care. She herself visited me and called up multiple times to check on my status while I was admitted. She did the procedure with amazing backup plans and preparations in place to ensure my physical safety. I am truly humbled by her gesture as a doctor. Even now after two months of my abortion, I still get calls from Care clinic to check on my health and wellbeing. I am deeply indebted to doctor Sangeeta Gomes for being there with me like a " caring mother" if not more.  Thank you doctor. Best regards.

review:
I have been consulting Dr. Sangeetha Gomes since last  4 years for various things. The reason is simple, her diagnosis is superb and the medication she prescribes works Everytime. Most recently I have been consulting her for pregnancy. Only because of her timely checkup schedules I delivered a healthy baby without any issue to my health. She kept checking on me by regularly calling  me if i had any cold or fever from eighth month onwards. I have never seen a doctor who takes care of their patients in such a personalised way. She will never put you in panic. She gives lot of confidence to her patients. A very good thing about her is, during pregnancy along with the medications she suggests some home remedies also for pain, cold, etc, which is very good since I wanted to take minimum medicines during pregnancy. 

She was preparing me for a normal delivery since start. She told me the diet to follow, the exercise to do. Although during labor my baby's heart beat dropped to a critical level, because of which she had to do an emergency operation. But within 10 days the wound was completely clear. 

During my stay in hospital she used to regularly call me to check my health and enquire whether the hospital staff is taking good care of me or not, since she was not an in-house doctor.
We were very relaxed from the doctor front during entire 9 months and even post pregnancy.

I will definitely recommend her any expecting mother. I referred her to few of my friends and all of them are happy consulting her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Sometimes Words are not enough to express your happiness.
After extensive search for a good doctor, Visited Sangeetha madam after being no child for almost 7 years. 
Without wasting time, after all advised tests and analysing the results, She understood the issue at the root level and started giving treatment to both my husband and me.
The treatment with her rich experience & vast knowledge in this field made me conceived just after only 2 months since I had met the doctor.
Conceiving itself brought us and our families, tons of happiness. This happiness got more than double when they identified twins in the 2nd scan.
Yes, Miracle happens when you meet right person (For us, In this case Sangeetha madam).

Her guidance, medication, timely checkups\tests through out the pregnancy period was outstanding. 
She explained risks involved in twin pregnancy and told us take all kinds of precautions including food intake, sleeping habbits, usage of inclined bed etc.
she took appropriate steps as she identified anolomy(issue) with one twin baby when I crossed 2nd trimester.
She made us clear and confident on steps she was going to take, and we were able to prolong till 34 weeks of pregnancy with her guidance and under careful monitoring at home itself.
Then she took right decision for delivery even before anything bad happens. 
Finally, The entire journey with madam yield us two healthy babies.
Now babies are of 2 months old and both doing exceptionally well. My DP is glimpse of recent visit with madam.

To summarize the best things at madam's treatment,
1) Understanding the problem at the root level and apply right treatment
2) Making patient to understand the problem clearly
3) Having good nurse team to assist us (especially Suvarna)
4) Taking right decision at right time
5) Most importanly, her incredible experience *** ********* (You can sense it in the very first visit itself).

Thanks a ton madam for your unforgettable gift of twins to us. Thank you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr Sangeeta is very experienced doctor. I had consulted her for my second pregnancy. My first child was born preterm in an emergency delivery as I suffered from preeclapsia and high BP. Hence I was very cautious for the second pregnancy. Experienced doctor, medical facilities and proximity were my criteria for choosing the doctor ‚Äì Dr. Sangeeta satisfied these completely. 
Throughout the pregnancy, she handled my case proactively and had complete hold of things. She was completely patient in hearing me out, handling my concerns. Never during the treatment had she asked us to get any unnecessary test done. Also, when it was time for utmost care, she rightly asked me for regular monitoring and took timely call for the operation.
** ******* *** **** **** ********** * no complication no panic unlike my previous experience. Stitches were neat and healed quickly. She is a tough taskmaster and kept the support staff on toes. Though even my second baby was born preterm with low birth weight, I would not blame the doctor as she took all the possible steps to avoid this.
Areas on which I was not satisfied are minor. Firstly, she is not directly accessible. Her phone number will be handled by her clinic nurses. You may not be able to talk to her even during emergency.
Secondly, I was not completely satisfied with any of the hospitals that she visits. She is a consultant and hence there is a disconnect post the delivery. Post-delivery care is left to junior, unexperienced doctors and nurses who are guided over phone by Dr. Sangeeta. So in case of any complication, you are at mercy of these incapable doctors.
Overall, I had really good experience with the doctor. I truly thank her for providing me the best medical advice and above all imbibing positive thinking.

tags: None
review:
Though we started consulting Dr. Sangeetha Gomes primarily because her clinic is close to where we stay in HSR Layout, our initial experience with her made us continue consulting her throughout the pregnancy. Ours was a high risk pregnancy due to multiple complications and Dr. Gomes was really patient in answering all our queries and concerns. She scolds you when you worry unnecessarily and is equally caring when required. There was an instance during our pregnancy period when we couldn‚Äôt feel movements of our baby, she quickly made few calls and redirected us to the hospital where we could get a Doppler done at that time of the night. The scan was ok, but she was waiting for us at her clinic after her consulting hours to have a look at the report.
 
Mother and baby's health used to be her primary focus all the time. Closer to the delivery, because of the complications she made us visit her every alternate day monitoring the progress. We used to get NST done at her clinic and she had a good cordial team of nursing staff to take care of her.
 
Since we were consulting at her clinic, she gave us all the hospital options where we could get the delivery done, pushed us to visit the hospitals to find out which one we were comfortable with. She is always upfront in terms of medication and treatment costs and even gave us an estimate of how much it would cost at each of the hospital. We had a planned C-section at Fortis Hospital, Bannerghatta road at 36 weeks since the baby was IUGR and mother had placenta previa condition. Taking into account the potential complications that might arise at the time of surgery, Dr. Sangeetha had suggested Fortis for the delivery. She made sure we were comfortable by explaining us why she choose Fortis and even took the pains of calling up the concerned person at the hospital and getting a room booked.
 
Post delivery, during the time when mother and baby were still at the hospital, we used to get call from the clinic every other day checking on the health of the baby and the mother.
 
We would strongly recommend Dr. Sangeetha Gomes and especially consulting at her clinic for a stress free pregnancy period.

tags: None
review:
We were blessed with a baby Girl on 07/03/2016 and we consulted Dr. Sangeetha Gomes right since the good news was heard. Our journey through these 8 months has been really smooth under the consultation of Dr. Sangeetha Gomes. She is very patient and humble, and listens to you calmly unlike the other doctors who are on a rush to consult the waiting patients. We meet her at her clinic (CARE CLINIC at HSR Layout) from the very beginning of my pregnancy. I have a son (12 Years) and my second Pregnancy was miscarried in St. John‚Äôs Hospital due to doctor‚Äôs negligence. This was my third Pregnancy I was guided by Dr. Sangeetha Gomes. She handled my case very sensitively. 
I found some spotting and bleeding  from the beginning of this Pregnancy and it lasts still 7th month and I was very scared but, she did everything that can be done by her by regular checkup , Scans, Hb Tests, TSH Test, Blood Sugar Test and other necessary Tests even Papsmear was done due to my spotting - all reports were normal.
I opted St. Philomena‚Äôs Hospital. On 30th week I felt the contractions and went to her clinic and consequently during 2 weeks I have done 2 NSTs and given duvadilan medicine to minimize the abdominal contraction pain and she immediately advised to take belic injection(1 dose)and betnosole injection(2 doses).
But on 34th  weeks my water breakage started at night and I admitted St. Philomena‚Äôs Hospital immediately as per her advice, but my platelet count was found less(<46000) and she immediately rushed me to Fortis Hospital (Bannerghatta Road) for platelet transfusion before going to C-section on the same Hospital. I delivered my baby Girl on 7th  March 2016 and got discharged on 10th March 2016.
She used to help me with all my worries/queries and being transparent in diagnosing me which helped me to build trust on her. She had also helped me post-Pregnancy with proper advice and Medications.
I gained 12 kgs. and was able to complete my term in 34 weeks and my daughter was born healthy and she is doing well you need to have faith on your Doctor and I would strongly recommend Dr. Sangeetha Gomes.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),Pregnant Women Counseling,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Dr. Sangeeta Gomes: We found her reference online and decided to visit her for a routine checkup. In the first visit itself we were very impressed by her attitude and behavior. She always suggests you the proper guidelines, but it never appears as hard or tough to follow. It was the obvious choice that we followed her consultation when we planned for our baby. Under her guidance, the 9 month journey was very smooth and we never had a moment of anxiety as we knew we had her with us to take us out of any difficulties, if any. During the hospital admission and the delivery process also she was there to guide us and provided her valuable insights to make the process smooth. After the delivery, she was following up with the duty doctors in the hospital and provided recommendations for the care of both mother and baby. Next day onwards for the rounds, she used to visit and tell us not to feel as we're in a hospital, like nothing has happened (note: we had a c-section) and encouraged us to get back to normal flow of life. She is the best we could have had as our guide and we're really blessed that she could be our advisor in the whole journey. Anyone who is planning for a baby, or even want to have a general gynaecology consultation, and if you're near or around Sarjapur/HSR area - she's the best you can have to consult with. Wish the very best to Sangeeta ma'am, may God bless you. 

P. S - A special mention to the sisters in Care clinic, who always kept in touch to check on the baby and mother's health after the delivery. They always responded to emergency questions made over phone and in general, are very friendly and helpful. Thanks to them, too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had 3 criteria when I was looking for a good gynecologist/obstetrician during my pregnancy - 1) Skill and experience 2) Someone who will try for a normal delivery,all conditions permitting and 3) A doctor who I will be comfortable with. I had consulted with Dr. Sangeetha from the 4th month of my pregnancy onwards. And I am so glad I chose her as my Obstetrician, it is one of the best decisions in my life. *** ********* ** ** ********* ********* ************* *** well experienced doctor. During the later part of my pregnancy, I had developed some complications, and Dr. Sangeetha chose to treat me via bed rest and simple medications instead of surgery. Under her guidance, I completed 36 weeks successfully and gave birth to a healthy child via normal delivery at St. Philomenas Hospital. I am very grateful to Dr. Sangeetha because my labour started at midnight. Dr. Sangeetha immediately came all the way to St. Philomenas at 1.30 a.m. early in the morning by herself to assist me in my delivery. As a first time mother at 34 years, seeing her join me in the labour room was one of the most reassuring feelings of my life. I truly appreciate the fact that she came to deliver my child (at 1.30 in the morning till 6 a.m) instead of just giving instructions to another doctor. Such dedication and commitment is a very rare quality! Dr.Sangeetha was like a family member in the labour room and she tried her best for me to have a normal delivery, which in the end I did. Her team followed up very well post delivery too. I would strongly recommend Dr. Sangeetha to anyone who wants * ******* *** ******* ************************* by your side at one of your most vulnerable moments. Thank you so much Dr. Sangeetha- you are amazing!

tags: None
review: Meeting Dr Sangeeta has been a beautiful  turning point in my life. I had lost hope of becoming a mother, having met almost all top shot gynecologists in bangalore without any positive outcome. When we got to know about her, looking a gynecologist in hsr, I had expected my consultation  to be the same as other famous gynecologists in bangalore- doctors meet you for five minutes and send you off for numerous tests.  She has what others lack-personal touch. But we were pleasantly surprised by the way she approached our problem.  She is everything you would want in your doctor and more than that she is a wonder person. It  was such a relief to finally get a wonderful doctor who instantly took charge of my problem and took care of me like a special person.  She took time to analyze my case and charted our a treatment plan designed specifically for me. She is highly efficient and methodical in her approach. She is friendly and patiently answered all trivial queries that we had, something that we found lacking in others. She is also very very positive and extremely confident which also puts the patient in a positive frame of mind, much needed when you are battling infertility. Her able guidance helped me survive my difficult pregnancy with almost all listed complications - diabetes, hypertension, hypothyroidism, carrying twin-with ease and to a near full term without any mishaps, which would have been otherwise impossible. Meeting her was so soothing that I would actually look forward to our monthly consultations during my pregnancy. I could reach her anytime via sms or phone call in case of emergency. She is well connected to good doctors also and this helped us in managing  the other problems that I had.  Thanks to her, we are now proud parents a boy/girl twins and this happened within a year and half of first meeting her.  She is an excellent surgeon and I was up and about within 12 hours of undergoing an emergency c section and healed completely within a week. The nurses at her clinic are also competent and well trained . I wish her all success and I pray to God that may she continue to enrich the lives of many more desperate couples wanting to become parents. I strongly recommend Dr Sangeeta to anyone looking for a good gynecologist particularly for infertility. You will be in good hands.

review:
We had blessed with HEALTHY & cute BABY BOYÔÅä (by C-section) on 26th-may-2017 in Fortis Hospital, Bannergatta Road, B'lore, 
We couple acknowledge Heartly thankful to Dr SANGEETHA GOMES madam & entire CARE CLINIC staff

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr. Sangeeta in first month of my second pregnancy and followed her throughout the pregnancy till my delivery. I am very satisfied with the way Dr. Sangeeta handled my case. One thing that stood out in all the regular checkups is that she is very experienced and gets the signals quite early For Eg. in our case she asked me to control diet to make sure that baby weight doesn't become too much to create complications in Normal Delivery, and it turned out that baby was fully grown(3 KG) when I normally delivered in my 37th week of pregnancy. 

One more thing I observed about the doctor is that she is very patient and avoids unneccessary steps as much as possible. During the 9th month we observed that Baby's heart rate used to spike above 180, while she brought it to our notice and explained the possible complications she did not jump to any action, only when she observed that my AFI(Water Levels) was contineously dropping after a couple of weeks, she asked me to go for NVD by inducing.

When I got admitted and pains were induced, I took pains for several hours without my cervix opening much, I asked the the doctor that I wont have enough strength to push the baby if pains are increased further, doctor actually stopped the pain induction allowed me to have foods and recover my strength and sleep till next early morning, when she resumed inducing the pain. In this whole process we had lost hopes since during my first time I experienced that inducing could lead to C-sec or use of instruments while birthing. So we were constantly asking doctor if we should go for C-sec directly. But Doctor had full confidence in her experience and me too and hence she encouraged me in every possible way for NVD and mentioned that we will try for NVD till the end. Only because of this I could gather all my strength and deliver baby normally under her guidance. Thanks to my doctor. 

Last but not the least the staff of Dr. Sangeeta (Special thanks to Dr Shweta who helped me deliver without Epidural, Sisters, Nurses- special thanks to Babitha, OnCall Doctors) were as patient and professional as we could expect as a patient. Also would like to mention about Dr Shweta, Atlast stage of my delivery I felt that I would not be able to endure any pains further and asked for Epidural. But Dr Shweta encouraged me for delivering without epidural since I was already in the last phase of delivery and could deliver at any time now. She and the Nurse (I am extremly sorry since I forgot her good name) gave me all kind of comfort level and their words and faith in me helped me in deliverying a healthy baby normally. 

Dr Sangeeta Gomes is the best Doctor. Thank you for all your support.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
Late night little prince added to our family. It's been a great journey for me from the day my wife got conceived till the time we first saw our little prince with Dr. Sangeeta Gomes. Living away from parents and in laws ...Dr. Sangeeta guidance throughout the journey and the kind of care she took was great. 
on the day when I got to know that my wife  got conceived , we just walked into Dr. Sangeeta Gomes clinic in HSR  layout, which is like my next door in the never changing Bangalore traffic. While we got our turn to meet the doctor, I was going through reviews about Dr. Sangeeta Gomes on practo and Google. That reviews about the doctor gave us a sigh of relief that we were in right place, right hands and lot of our time got saved in searching for a right doctor in a city like Bangalore. She cleared all our doubts with lot of patience and added reasoning for each and every suggestion of hers. She was very particular about the diet a pregnant woman should take and we did follow her strictly and the outcome was a healthy baby of ours. Let me quote with an example on her diet suggestion, looking at my wife‚Äôs weight growth during first few 3months of pregnancy, doctor suggested her to stop having milk and asked her to have only 3 fruits per week. This was a great surprise to our parents and in-laws, started asking us to consult a different doctor as generally all kinds of fruits and milk would be the best diet every person believe once a woman is pregnant. But we followed doctor suggestion in all the diet plan she suggested. Diet plan differs from person to person and that doctor only could tell depending on the patient response.  Our journey was smooth and once during our consultation post 30 weeks, she has predicted the baby weight depending on the latest ultra sound scan and gave us confidence of normal delivery. To our surprise on our 9th month scan it was detected that baby has loop around the neck and doctor has suggested to go for c-sec as might get complicated during vaginal delivery, explaining us different angles of her suggestion and left the final decision to us. According to our decision we waited for normal delivery, but one evening uneasiness in the stomach led us to her clinic and the test that she did that night showed that baby heart beat dropped and we went for emergency C-section section. 
On special note I would like to thank care clinic's sisters for their follow-up from the time my wife got admitted to almost a week post discharge from the hospital.

tags: None
review:
Consulting Dr.Sangeeta has been the best thing we did for fertility and pregnancy related concerns.
We were trying since 2 years and on a friend's suggestions we met her, after experiencing half baked suggestions from two other doctors.
Right from the first visit, Dr.Sangeeta helped us with understanding all the aspects of the treatment approach and more that anything gave us hope, with lot of positive vibes. All this ensured in three months time we had news of confirmed pregnancy to share.
We continued to consult for pregnancy as well. Dr.Sangeeta did not take any chances and had us covered from any risks, with the medications and advices. Visiting her at regular intervals helped us in sailing through the months comfortably.
‚ÄåIn the last phase, doctor suggested for C-section as the baby was in breach position and there was fluctuations during NST tests. Dr.Sangeeta ensured we had the medication that ensured a healthy baby. The surgery was done at Motherhood. The process in the operation theatre itself took less than 30 minutes, with local anestesia. It was well coordinated, with no pain. Dr.Sangeeta and her team made it all look so easy and made my wife absolutely comfortable. Dr informed we were blessed with baby girl, and then I heard the baby cry for the first time announcing her arrival.. and was introduced to the most adorable baby.
‚Äå
‚ÄåThe post surgery process was also well managed by the hospital staff.
‚ÄåWith the new phase of motherhood, series of new q's and concerns came up.. which were all addressed by Dr.Sangeeta during her visits or via SMS. She remembers the concerns discussed in earlier communication and will ask about it in the next interaction. Everyday there was follow up from the Care clinics staff, ensuring both mother and baby were doing fine. We are continuing to consult the doctor for post surgery care and find the same expertise.

‚ÄåDr.Sangeeta's consulting is impeccable. We trust her completely and highly recommend to anyone facing fertility issues or need to consult during pregnancy.
‚ÄåShe has been a blessing for us.

review:

We were blessed with a baby Girl on 17/02/2017 (Normal Delivery) and we consulted Dr. Sangeetha Gomes in motherhood hospital right since the good news was heard. Our journey through these 9 months has been really smooth under the consultation of Dr. Sangeetha Gomes.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We had a very good experience with this doctor. 

After 4 years of trying naturally and two failed IUIs (with another gynaecologist), I conceived naturally.
When we were heart broken by a moderately high NT scan result and unfriendly behavior of another gynaecologist, Dr.Sangeetha came as the much needed positive boost that we required. She patiently and enthusiastically guided us only with necessary scans and medications. And she was the first doctor who did not ask us to come every week. We only went once every month until 8th month completion. She patiently gave us the reason for each medication and was always a fun and jovial person to talk to. She never forces anything and only gives suggestions. We took all her suggestions and everything went well. At 37 weeks completion, my amniotic fluid was low and doctor suggested c-section. We went ahead with her suggestion (since this was a precious pregnancy for us) and delivered a healthy baby boy on Oct 12 2017. 

One noteworthy aspect of this doctor was how she took efforts to always reduce our medication expenses by reducing medications at right times. 

We would definitely recommend her highly to anyone !

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
For my wife, 2nd pregnancy detected during Jan 2017 and search for doctor begins. My 1st kid was delivered 3.5 yrs back in my hometown and was a normal delivery. Based on online reviews we selected Dr Sangeeta.

During the course of our 9 months visit Dr recommended diet plan and regularly monitored weight. Many times she raise warnings when she feels like weight is getting increased more than expected. 

My relative's main worry was C-Section delivery will be performed in Bangalore as this is very much common and they wanted us to get our baby delivered in my hometown. Based on our personal needs (regular office and kid's school) we decided that we will be in Bangalore. We dont have choice other than to trust the Dr and follow her instructions. On 14-Sep there was 9th month ultrasound performed and Dr checked and confirmed that based on the reports of tests performed during course of 9 months and current ultrasound its very likely that delivery will be normal and no c-section will be required.  

On 19-Sep my wife delivered a cute healthy baby girl and it was a normal delivery at Motherhood hospital, Sarjapur road branch. We all were very happy. On 20-Sep based on Dr's recommendation my wife was discharged. Post delivery there was a regular call for 3 days from Care Clinic asking about the condition of mother and baby.

Overall experience was excellent. Me along with my wife and parents were highly satisfied.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
We found Dr.Sangeeta Gomes extremely unprofessional and insensitive. We went to her one year before we started trying and she said I could take all the time I wanted and age wasnt a factor. After the first miscarriage, she said this is normal and told us to try again normally after 3 months. We did that and there was another miscarriage. After which we went to her. To that she lied throughout the consultation. She said we should have gone to her before we started trying and that she could have "prevented" this miscarriage. She lied that it was I who had told her not to give me any medicines. And in the end when I asked if age was a problem she said definitely. Not even knowing that she gave completely opposite answers when we went earlier. And to make it worse she started acting, saying "Sad sad, this could have been prevented. This is so sad".

In the end she told us to take tests which were for infertility not miscarriages. She prescribed 4-5 tablets even before the test results came our, without even explaining what those were for. And she demeaned the other doctor we went to during an emergency earlier calling her junior and inexperienced. And she charges randomly. There is no fixed consultation fee. I can show the proofs.

I 100% regret going to her.

review:
My experience with Dr.Sangeetha Gomes is worth a mention. I am blessed with a baby boy on March 2017 in Motherhood hospital.

When I conceived I met her first time in her clinic. As I was overweight she made me follow proper diet and monitored my weight throughout my pregnancy so that I won't be affected by gestational diabetis. I wanted to deliver normally and she motivated me for the same and also guided me in doing good exercises. She always answers all the doubts and questions.

After 9th month when I went for check up my fluid was lower than 6 I.e., it had reached 4.3 which was dangerous for the baby. She immediately asked me to admit in hospital and also she reached hospital immediately.  And through C section I delivered a baby boy and we both are healthy.

She also visits in hospital post delivery and enquiries your health which is really good thing. Also I got call daily after my delivery for 3 days during my hozpitalization from Care Clinic. They enquired my health and always asked to call them in case if I face any problem. I do recommend Dr.Sangeetha Gomes.

Thank you

After that under her medication and proper tests I have conceived once again. Now 15th week running and all is going well. ‚ÄúI recommend Dr. Sangeetha since she is very experienced & ************* *******

Continuation to the story. In 9th month my water bag got damaged and we reached rainbow baneerugatta at around 12 am, duty doctor consulted us and told it is mercury stained some medical termionalogy but what we understand it is emergancy sutivation. In mean time duty doctor called sangeetha and briefed the sutivation. Over the phone sangeetha explained my husband the sutivation and asked us to take decision for which he told yes for c section. tags: None
review:
Hi, I was trying for baby for the past 4 years with different doctors & visited even Fortis hospital. Everywhere the solution was to go for IUI for 4 cycles & then IVF, prior to IUI we tried multiple cycles with tablets & injections, nothing worked. Finally before trying IVF, we just wanted to consult with Dr.Sangeetha mam once.
First of all we liked her approach with complete positive vibes & the good part was to cross check few important reports to ensure the data is correct. As many doctors with whom we consulted before blindly supported the wrong report provided by the Fortis & suggested treatments accordingly. After which we got to know the AMH (2.1) measured by Fortis was incorrect. With a very healthy AMH level, we were running around with doctors for treatments which are supposed to be followed for a low AMH level patient.
Post the result, Dr.Sangeetha advised not to go for IUI or IVF with such a healthy AMH (4.1) level, she figured out that there is a minor issue in fallopian tube, which was the problem & with 2 months of treatment, i got Pregnant naturally without any trouble.
Dr.Sangeetha is not at all money minded and she take spends enough time with each patient and clarifies every doubts. She is very friendly and takes good care of patients and make them very comfortable.

tags: None
review: Dr.Sangeetha had helped me to conceive by treating thyroid and pcod. I had conceived in January 2016 and there was complications in my pregnancy. Initially I had spotting, thankfully nothing went wrong and doctor treated to in clotting of the blood. And 20th week scan confirmed restricted blood flow. I was asked to take rest and Dr.Sangeetha prescribed few medicine to increase the blood flow. Gradually blood flow was normal with one artery. My 37th week scan stated that there is a cord around the neck of the baby and the liquor quantity too had decreased. Doctor explained the completion of waiting for normal delivery, yet she insisted us to take a call, whether to go for c-section or to wait for normal delivery, for which she had to monitor to ensure baby is safe. We didn't wanted to take chance as doctor had told the complication which would arise if we wait. It was the wise decision as baby had consumed meconium and liquor quantity was very less. I delivered healthy baby boy on September 12th 2016. Doctor was constantly in touch with me making sure me and my baby are doing well. Though the circumstances were not favorable she visited us in hospital and helped me to feed baby, which was challenging task initially. Me and my family are thankful to her for making my pregnancy go smoothly and for insisting the best hospital for delivery. I strongly recommend Dr.Sangeetha for infertility treatment and Pregnancy.

Now in Detail : 
Dr.Sangeetha is a well experienced Gynecologist whom you can rely on with complete trust , 
We were initially visiting a doctor in Indiranagar for nearly 3 months * *** ****** *** * **** ***** * ****** * *** *** *** ******** *** ****** *** ***** ** ** **** * ****** ****** * we were so frustrated as we were loosing hope , time and money due to multiple visits .
One day we saw Care clinic near to our home and started consulting Dr.Sangeetha Gomes , on our second visit she diagnosed the problem , explained us clearly what needs to be done , and gave us a big ray of hope and peace of mind , She personally care for her patients and takes care of them .she is very transparent and straight forward person , which will help you know things better , it will help you know what you are heading for, let it be a normal treatment or a surgery , after her effective treatment my wife got conceived and currently in her 4th month of her pregnancy, we wish to recommend Dr. Sangeetha Gomes to any one who is in search of a good Gynecologist who can help you for sure with full confidence , All the best :-)

tags: None
review:
We were looking for a trusted Gynae in HSR layout since we had moved in recently into Bangalore. After checking in with a few neighborhood doctors, we settled with Dr Sangeetha. She makes you feel comfortable and does'nt create undue fear/panic. A lot of unnecessary worries arise during pregnancy due to the body changes happening and all need a an expert hand and a healing touch, this is where her experience and confidence came in extremely handy. We never had to undergo unnecessary scans and tests or bear any extra costs and everything we did was well explained per the rule book. You always feel more assured after every visit since a lot of things she could say by visual observation and touch.
Since the basic nursing facilities (for iron drips/other common  injections in pregnancy) are within the clinic, you dont need to be admitted to a hospital and the whole process is really hassle-free.
The recommended hospital (Motherhood) was one of the better experiences we could have expected(much better than the one in our first child ) and given that other friends had reported bad experiences with other hospitals in Bangalore. We got real professional support during delivery and an extremely cosy and comfortable place for post-recovery.

Would highly recommend Dr Sangeetha and Motherhood hospital to anybody staying in HSR Layout/Sarjapur Road/Koramangala and nearby surroundings.

tags: None
review:
First i would like to thanks Dr. Sangeetha Gomes. I was bit worried on getting pregnant after my miss carriage. I consulted Dr.Sangeetha Gomes in her clinic "Care Clinic" in HSR layout. First consultation at her clinic gave us lot of confidence. She understands the patients problems and addresses it in a very friendly and amicable manner. She answered all our queries with lot of patience. When we started trying for a baby, I got to know that I had hypothyroid, pcod and bicornuate uterus. She suggested to get HSG test to ensure there were no blocks in my tubes. She treated me for tubal infection for 4 weeks. After that i conceived in the first cycle itself. I was panic when i saw spotting in my 6th week. She explained the problem, prescribed few injections as a precautionary measure. She is experienced and easy-handler in any critical situations. With the help of regular checkups, proper scans and blood tests, my pregnancy under her is going smooth and heading towards due date.

I would like to convey my sincere regards and thanks to her!!!

tags: None
review:
I was blessed with a Baby Boy on 18/1/2016. I would like to Thank Dr. Sangeetha Gomes for all the medical care that she took.

She is very prompt and confident about her treatment. She is highly experienced in a way that she was even able to tell me my haemoglobin count just looking at my tongue :) (I confirmed this after my blood test later :) ).

I had few niggles initially but was promptly solved by her. I had to deliver my baby in the 37th week due to some complications and had to go for a c-sec. Dr. Sangeetha promptly addressed this issue and my baby was delivered with a healthy weight. 

I always wanted a Normal delivery to which Dr. always encouraged me to do so my doing proper exercises and walk which helps for normal delivery. Though I could not not take the risk of normal delivery in my case but at the end, everything was good and I am recovering well.

She is very strict when it comes to you or your Baby's health and would sometime remind you of your old school strict PT teacher. But That really helps you to be disciplined and achieve a fruitful result.

I wish her all the very best and would for sure recommend her anytime.

Thanks,
Shradha Singh :)

tags: None
review:
I visited motherhood Sarjapur branch on 14th March 2016 around 11 pm for my wife's delivery. As per final scan report, everything was normal. Baby weight was 2.89 kg, baby position was vertical with head down and we were told by Dr Sangeetha Gomes till last day that it is a perfect case for normal delivery. Labour pain started naturally and we  reached hospital within 10 minutes since labour pain started. When we reached hospital, water discharge was minimal and labour pain was usual but Dr Sangeetha Gomes visited hospital almost after 5 hours. For first five hours, it was taken care buy less expertise doctor and nurses. They didn't try for normal birth at all and intentionally didn't use injection to handle labour.
After 5 hours Dr Sangeetha Gomes reached hospital and as soon as she entered in labour room, she started pressurizing us for surgical. Doctor misbehaved with us and we were handled unprofessionally.
They called Dr Swapnil for final scan again who told baby position has been changed but never shared the scan report even after asking multiple times.
I complained the incidence to hospital management Mr Anand but nothing worked out.
Finally they went through surgical for a normal case. We were there for 3 days and saw multiple deliveries but none of them were normal.
These people are big time frauds with unprofessional attitude and they can cross all the limits for making more money.
Please don't think of visiting motherhood if you care for your family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Dr. Sangeeta Gomes not only be with us during delivery period or a surgery, but she also guides us through our recovery.  Support staff of the care clinic also were good.
