tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
my wife had multiple issues during pregnancy, it was a high risk pregnancy, previously we were consulting with another doctor from another hospital but my wife continued to have troubles and it was not improving...then on 8th month we approached dr Sangeeta. In a high risk pregnancy there is proper counselling & follow-up required which we didn‚Äôt get from my last doctor. Here we got very good proper counselling & follow-up from doctor very frequently on the patient status which helped us in terms of understanding things, getting confident and not taking undue tension. My baby was born pre-term as mentioned before due to some pregnancy  complications but doctor gave us proper counselling on all the aspect of early delivery like if there is any risk involving in early delivery, clearing all our doubts and queries regarding delivery & what could be the side effects if we dont go for early delivery. When we were fully confident & mentally ready then only she went for delivery & post delivery i could see that it was a very good decision to go for the preterm delivery else there would have been some problem with the baby. Baby and mother are both doing good now and being released from hospital.

Even though we approached her just 14 days before the delivery, she has been extremely pleasant with us and we would recommend Dr Sangeetha Gomes to anyone willing to extend their family.. üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Sangeeta Gomes is an amazing doctor, very professional and practical with a human touch. She always carries a luvly smile and her friendly nature is an asset which makes you feel comfortable during the interaction. I consulted her in the middle of my pregnancy and she has been very supportive all the way, clarified all the concerns that one may have regarding pregnancy or any related queries and provided guidance which help me a lot. She told some home remedies and would encourage to follow them, avoiding the unnecessary medicines where required.

During the last stage of my pregnancy, my AFI went very low and her experience helped to identify the same, suggested for an immediate scan and proceed with Caesarean to ensure the safety of baby. Also she ensured all the necessary care is taken for recovery post delivery as well.

Needless to say, I would strongly recommend Dr. Sangeeta Gomes. She is simply one of the best doctor i have come across and a very BIG THANK YOU to her for such a wonderful experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We know Doctor Sangeeta since I got married. She is kind hearted and very supportive Doctor.

I have consulted many doctor in between years we have spent lot of money, time and underwent stress. Its been 6+years of marriage and I was struggling to conceived and it was really hard times for me and my hubby. Earlier I had abortion due to some complications, after that we were trying hard to get treatment but we were failing a lot of times.

After a long time again we decided to meet Doctor Sangeeta, she treated us **** **** and supportive during my fertility treatment. She guided me for diet and exercise also some tests. I followed little harder for diet and compulsory tablets given by her. 

I had a lose a hope due to fail treatments before, my hubby had very positive hope on Doctor Sangeeta and whenever we met her she told us it will happen very soon. She discuss very calmly and very friendly to us. So the day is come. I am pregnant since 2months.

This is my first review about a Doctor, but I will strongly recommend her she is the best doctor I have met in entire life, she is very friendly, supportive Doctor.  She gives very good treatment, and needed tests and scan if at all needed.

By grace of GOD and Doctor Sangeeta I am pregnant and taking pregnancy check-up. Me and hubby are happy that our dream has come true.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited Dr Sangeeta Gomes Care clinic for our second pregnancy. From the first meeting itself we were very comfortable with her and her diagnosis. Her vast experience speaks ** *** ********* and comfortability she provides to her patients. Her clinic is also equipped with the right staff and medication and medical instruments to provide easy diagnosis. Though my pregnancy was smooth through the early months, during my 34th week when we did the NST test doc suspected that the fetal heartbeats were high. She again asked me to do are test in the 35th week. Her clinic is equipped with the NST machine which helps us to test the fetal heartbeat without going to any diagnosis clinic. When there was no change in the situation during the late 35th week Dr Sangeeta advised us to go for a C sec for the benefit of the baby and myself. We then got ourselves admitted at Motherhood hospital and delivered a healthy baby boy. Though he was a pre-term baby the doctors and the nurses monitored him quickly to recovery. Dr Sangeeta and her staff were continuously monitoring the situation and guiding me through lactation and recovery advise. She and her staff kept close contact with me even post discharge. They are always available on calls and provide a personal touch to our relationship. I highly recommend her for any gynae and obstetrics related treatments. I have a special mention to her staff who are very friendly, supportive and approachable during all times.

review:
I came to know about Dr. Sangeetha Gomes from Practo and start referring her pre-pregnancy for normal health check-up. She is very friendly and give enough time to understand the problem. 

I referred her again after I came to know about my pregnancy. Because of her, the pregnancy stage went smooth. She prescribed only the required test and medicine and always guided whenever i have any query. I started referring her in her Clinic 'Care Clinic'. I started getting regular call from the clinic regarding update on my health conditions. 

In third trimester of pregnancy, i had cholestasis of pregnancy. She referred me the best doctor under whose guidance my health condition got improved. 

She always tries that i had normal delivery. On 23rd Feb 2018, I am blessed with baby boy with C-section which was required at that time as per my health condition. The stay in hospital also went smooth without any issue with minimum pain.

Post-pregnancy also, i am getting regular call from Care Clinic to know about mine and baby health.

I  always refer her to everyone. I always got a motherly care from her with mix of scolding and care for my well-being.

Thanks a lot Doctor for everything.

review:

Dr.Sangeeta  madam did not take any chances and had us covered from any risks, with the medications and advices. Visiting her at regular intervals helped us in sailing through the months comfortably.

Dr.Sangeeta and her team made it all look so easy and  comfortable. We had a baby girl.I would specially like to thank Care Clinic staff  as they took special care during pregnancy and post pregnancy (Calling us regularly for my and babys health).

review:
My wife faced miscarriage in first pregnancy and after ultrasound scan, got to know about Endometriosis so we visited Dr. Sangeeta Gomes in care clinic to consult about this problem so we can plan better and avoid miscarriage in future. She was quite friendly in first visit and explained in details and even she was suggesting lot more to do in a natural way to cure Endometriosis and was strongly agianst any surgery and suggested couple of tests to run through from specific lab center(ebisu) only and said you can try to conceive next month.
We were so happy after this discussion with doctor. 
We went through whole process of lab test and spent around 30k and went back to visit her about next advice. All lab tests were normal/postive and we were so happy to visit doctor and was expecting positive response w.r.t our last discussion.
BUT when we met her and showed our reports,she didn't even look into the reports and said you have to go through surgery procedure and couple of more tests and perform these tests from fortis lab only. We were so shocked to listen because her words were totally opposite from the first discussion *** ** *** ******* **** ******* ***** ********* ** ** **** *** **** ***** * **** ********** ******* ********* ****** *** *** ***** ** ***** ***** ** ****** ******
We see doctor as a second God who will help us in our any kind of treatment but when doctor words are totally opposite in two visits then how someone can trust a doctor?*** *** *** **** ***** *** ******* *** ***** **** *** ****** **** *** *** ****** **** **** ******* *** why we had to go through all the tests.
It felt bad when we spent around 30k for the tests which doctor suggested but doctor didn't even look at it because it was not needed for the time.
I wouldn't recommend her to anyone. ******* ***** ***** ********** ** ************ ********** ***** **** *** they should respect others feeling and understand about their profession as a holy thing.
Highly disappointed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I visited Dr Sangeetha Gomes at Motherhood hospital, Sarjapur when we were about to plan our pregnancy. She prescribed all necessary tests and suggested to go for IUI without any delay since my AMH level was low. I also had a subcerosal fibroid. My confidence started decreasing thinking that there might be issues and my pregnancy might be delayed. But Dr Sangeetha was so confident and made it look like such an easy thing to achieve and that definitely increased my confidence and started the whole process with a positive attitude. I was conceived in the second cycle of IUI. From that moment till my delivery, Dr Sangeetha and team were with us. We were able to consult her without much delay and she even answered all the queries by phone as well. Its difficult for a busy doctor like Dr Sangeetha to take out some time from her schedule and be reachable on phone. During my pregnancy journey there were difficult times due to issues with my fibroid and she was concerned about preterm delivery chances. She suggested complete bed rest and gave all necessary injections to prevent any chance of contractions and also for faster lung development of the baby. During the later stages, NST started showing variations frequently and she suggested immediate delivery due to foetal tachycardia. I was panicked since i hadn't given much thought about my delivery untill then. But i took some time and convinced myself to trust her and proceed with delivery. I gave birth to a baby girl in August and she is my everything now. I would have gone through anything to have her in my hands. Dr Sangeetha couldn't visit us in hospital everyday after my delivery since she was down with fever. She contacted me via phone and gave all the instructions. The care clinic team contacted me everyday even after my delivery to make sure we are doing fine. My sister was also consulting Dr Sangeetha had her delivery at Motherhood hospital. I thank Dr Sangeetha for all the help and care throughout my journey. I also thank the team at care clinic and all staff nurses of Motherhood Hospital Sarjapur for their kindness and sincerity. I was able to give birth at Motherhood hospital with ease and i am happy that i chose Dr Sangeetha and Motherhood hospital for this most important time of my life.

review:
Dr. Sangeeta Gomes has zero patience.  We waited for 2 hours finally got to meet her.  I had to discuss about my pregnancy.  I was 6 weeks pregnant that time.  She didn't even talk to us for 2 mins.  Asked us to get scanning done and meet her again with reports in her HSR layout clinic. Same story again in her HSR layout clinic, waited for an hour to show the reports instead of seeing the report she started scolding saying why did you take appointment for showing report? That meeting was all about she scolding us more than seeing the report.  Saw report for a min started telling you have bleeding and baby's heartbeat is less get the scanning done again after 12days and asked me to take an injection weekly once for 6 weeks.on asking why injection I get reply from nurse saying since you are pregnant we are giving you injection.  That doctor makes sure that we will buy injection from her pharmacy and the nurses make sure that they will charge us 1k per visit.  I got the scanning done again this time waited for 2 days to show the report. 3rd time since I could not go at 4.30 in the evening my in-laws took the report to her. Instead of seeing the reports she starts to scold my in-laws again. My in-laws asked her that I'm getting tired because of the injection why are you giving? She rudely replies if you want you take but never says why injection.  On consulting other doctor ** *** ** **** **** *** ********* ** **** ** ** **** *****  ********  ********* ** ** *** ******** **** ******* ** *** ** ******  ******** ***** ***** **** **** ***** ******** ***** ***** **** ********* *** * ***** ** **** *** *** ****** **** * *** ** * *** * **** ******  please don't go to her. ***** *** **** **** ******* *** ***** *** ******** ****** ** *** ******** ******* ******* *** ** **** ** **** ******* ** ********** ***** **** ********* We have all rights to know what's happening and what will happen.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Normal vaginal deliveryIt was a great experience with the journey of 9 months till delivery with Dr sangeetha gomes.Initially when we planned for a baby we chose Dr sangeetha gomes and we are glad that we made the right choice. Before conceiving she makes sure that all tests are done and in my case my AMH was reducing due to which she suggested us to have the baby soon,few tablets were given and I got conceived within 2 months.A fter conceiving entire 9 months she gave proper dates for tests and scans along with good amount of tablets.When I was in my 8th month through scanning we  came to know that my water  level is reducing ,she gave 1 week treatment by giving fluids and injections and I was under  constant observation.After a week of the treatment when I had completed 31 weeks my NST was improper and got admitted to motherhood,we almost thought at that moment I will get delivered at that time when the baby was just 1.6kg,but Dr. sangeetha gomes was a game changer at the last moment where she chose for a second opinion for scanning and luckily over there my water level was normal and I was sent home.With all the complications like being diabetic,water level probelm and being O-ve we thought there won't be any chance for normal delivery,but Dr sangeetha gomes told me that it is possible and with keen observation she made a great choice and pushed us for normal delivery.For delivery motherhood hospital had a wonderful team and Dr sangeetha gomes made sure I was monitored well and then I had a successful normal delivery.Even after the delivery Dr sangeetha gomes observed a cyst which was damaged during the delivery when the baby was pushed out and she fixed the same within no time.For all those who are trying  for a baby and in search of a good doctor in Bangalore I would like to suggest Dr sangeetha gomes because of her great decision making process,positivity, perfect monitoring throughout the pregnancy for a smooth delivery.*** ** *** **** .You yourself will feel that you have made the right choice by choosing her as your doctor. GO FOR IT. GOOD luck .

tags: None
review:
We have been trying for over an year, with age factor not in our favour. With no positive signs, we were in a confused state on what the exact issue was. We consulted two other doctors, underwent tests but it did not help and were scared with medical jargons.
On a friend's advice we consulted Dr. Sangeeta. In the first consulting, she listened to our concerns, checked the tests and provided us with a clear direction on how she will be addressing it. We went for few follow up sessions, during which she gave a complete picture of where we stood, the reason for the tests to take, well explained the results and accordingly how the medications will help. She is also accessible via SMS, and responds in few minutes. Most importantly, she exuded hope and positivity, which I believe is very important. In few months, we were blessed with the news of a new member joining us and we are currently consulting her on this journey of pregnancy.
Dr. Sangeeta is someone to go to for any fertility/pregnancy related issues. We can vouch for her approach and trust her completely. The Care clinic at HSR is well managed by her team of nurses, who are ever enthusiastic to support.

Thanks,
Priti

tags: None
review:
Dr. Sangeetha Gomes is A Family Now for us. It is hard for us to imagine life without her and what she has done for us. I had put in my comments on our early pregnancy days and today I echo every bit of it. I thank Almighty for introducing her to us (we were just walking across her clinic frustrated not having a kid and we saw her board and walked in). The whole pregnancy experience has been absolute. A real and spontaneous attitude. She gave us a reason to live yesterday. We  had our baby in the most ambiguous and challenging times.

We are not doctors and we go to doctors since they are subject matter experts and we need to trust their advice else, situations and lives can get complicated. We reached Dr. Gomes in the most bizarre circumstance and she as a good doctor explained the situation to us. She gave the choice to go for normal or C section and never pressurized us for C section.We selected C section after enough interviewing with the doctor and we were convinced that for us it was the way forward. 

My wife delivered our life yesterday and she is already walking. A bundle of joy is breathing in rhythm with us and Dr. Sangeetha Gomes made it happen. I have been supremely successful in my career but was living a life without meaning. Dr. Gomes gave me a new life and purpose to me and my family and hence I say she is part of my family. Thank You Doctor for being part of our lives

tags: None
review:
I had a very BAD experience with Dr. Sangeetha.
Actually I booked the appointment in Motherhood hospital at 10.10am and I reached the hospital at 10.30am.  I agree that I couldn't report on time, but when I checked in the reception they allowed me to proceed with the billing and to consult the doctor.  And I waited till 11.45 am. The nursing staff did the BP and weight checkup. When I entered the doctor's room around 12 pm she denied to consult me saying that I am late. But the way she denied duty is bit arrogant and insulting which I didn't expect from a reputed doctor.
I visited the doctor after going through the practo  feedbacks only, and I didn't expect this sort of an approach from her. I appreciate her punctuality , but being a doctor some humanity is also expected.
I explained her that I took leave at my work place and came , and I have been waiting  for more than 1 hour but she didn't consider. 

The hospital and nursing staff  apologized to me *** *** ******** *** **** *** ******* **** *** ** **** **** ***** I would like to thank the hospital management and nursing staff for helping me to get the refund. But this was my first bad experience with a doctor.

IIUC the 4th one in the Hippocratic oath is" I will remember that there is art to medicine as well as science, and that warmth, sympathy and understanding may outweigh the surgeon's knife or the chemists drug. "
*** *** **** ********* ** * **** ***** ****** ***** *** ** ***** ********** *** ****** ****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Myomectomy,
review: Our journey with Dr. Sangeeta started with pre-pregnancy screening where we learnt that I had 2 large subserosal fibroids (~10cm, ~3cm). Under her care we were able to  go through our first pregnancy despite significant fibroid growth. By 32nd week, the fibroids had grown to 3.5 kgs and were degenerating which led to preterm labor. Her team was able to safely delivery my baby and successfully extract the fibroid without any complications during the surgery.  Fibroid removal has significantly improved my back pain. We would highly recommend Dr. Sangeeta and her team based on how well they managed each and every complication that came our way.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

** ******** ***** ** *** **** ****** *** ***** **** **** She has been very supportive throughout my pregnancy and always recommends natural remedies when required. After delivering my baby (C-section), Dr Gomes provided timely inputs on breastfeeding, ensuring skin contact with my newborn etc. These inputs really made the difference!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had a normal vaginal delivery with the guidance of Dr Sangeetha Gomes. Throughout my pregnancy i followed what mam told me such as pelvic floor exercises, household work, diet etc and this helped me a lot in short labour and i was able to handle the active labour without much pain and baby was born in just 4 pushes. Doctor also makes sure not to prescribe a lot of medicines and believes in home remedies and traditional methods. She made sure baby weight was not on high end by guiding me to maintain my diet. This helped me a lot to give birth through vaginal delivery. I owe a lot to Dr Sangeetha and i recommend everyone to go to her if you are keen on having a smooth delivery process.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
With a great pleasure I am writing this feedback on my experience with Dr. Sangeeta Gomes.

Dr. Sangeeta is extremely positive & she will answer to your every question with a lot of patience. In first month of treatment under Dr. Sangeeta‚Äôs supervision, I got pregnant. I fell short of words to thank her.
 
If you are facing any gynae problems, she is the one who will take you out of it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I got married 3 years back and started planning for kid about 2 years back. My first pregnancy turned out to be ectopic and embryo had to be removed through surgery. Even the second pregnancy turned ectopic and Doctor said nothing much can be done. This is when I read about Dr Sangeetha Gomes and visited her about 6 months back. She was friendly and explained us the problem in detail. She also had a structured plan to diagnose me and to ensure I dont get ectopic pregnancy again in future. With all the tests and treatment, I was able to conceive 3 months back. I am thankful to Dr Sangeetha Gomes who not only treated me but also supported me when i was demotivated. She is truly an expert in treating Ectopic pregnancy cases and would strongly recommend anyone with similar issues to visit her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: My pregnancy journey experience with Dr.Sangeetha Gomes had been seamless throughout. To begin with, no appointment system so you can approach her anytime within the stated hours in her clinic. She never hyped on the pregnancy weaning instead made me feel at ease in each visit. Her follow up calls and messages from the clinic had been remarkable. She was super cool on my big day which really helped not just me but my family to stay grounded. She visited me and baby post delivery and tracked our follow ups too. I and my family are grateful to Dr.Sangeetha Gomes for such comforting experience.

review:
I would say Dr. Sangeeta madam is a doctor with Midas touch and we are lucky enough to be treated by her. We had consulted many doctors over the course of 6 years of our married life (at least 8 - 10) for PCOS / PCOD but never get over it. we heard about madam through one of our relatives and consulted her at care clinic. 

She had examined all our previous reports and suggested us the medication ******* tailor made for me to overcome PCOS to become pregnant just in the 2nd cycle of my treatment. She studied the follicle growth and cysts in the ovary to the least level of detail,  I'm now a 3 month pregnant and grateful  to Sangeeta madam for the way she treated us.

Would take this opportunity to recommend madam for all who has PCOS / PCOD and also with different infertility problems.

Thanks, Keerti.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:

Dr. Sangeetha treated this situation with few oral medicines and it was gone in a month !! Surprised we were and much delighted to have avoided the painful surgery process. 
Further on, we consulted Dr.Sangeetha for pregnancy, my wife is now 3 months pregnant. 
Dr. Sangeetha Golmes is decisive, confident, very proactive and caring. Though she comes across hundred's of patients, one look and she recalls all the treatment she has given to a patient.

tags: None
review: Our cousins recommended Dr. Sangeeta Gomes as they had a great experience with her. We were surprised with the level of attention given to us right from the first day. She took time to explain the why's and how's of each test and it's role in understanding the baby's development. She was very friendly and easy to approach. Her first focus was on making us comfortable, which scored a lot of points with my wife. We could drop by her clinic or call her to have our doubts clarified. The best part was that we were informed of our choices and pros and cons of everything clearly. She also personally delivered the baby in Motherhood hospital and came back for check-ups till the discharge time. Overall, we would definitely recommend Dr. Sangeeta to all our friends and family, thanks to her experience and warmth.

tags: None
review:
I met Dr Gomes during my normal anual health checkup. By then I was planning to have a baby we discussed this with her she guided us and we got out evaluation cycle checked and the very next month I conceived. Since then Dr Gomes was there with us guiding us through out our pregnancy. She was cautious and was always making sure there are no issues with me or the baby. She was encouraging throughout this period. She was always available to talk if I needed her. Finally I completed my 38 weeks and during my delivery as well she was cheering me up as I was totally nervous. She held my baby and showed to me it was overwhelming. She made sure I get the best treatment even during my stay in hospital and she called in everyday till today when my son is 10 days old to ensure we are doing fine.

I would recommend Dr Sangeetha to everyone who want to enjoy there pregnancy. She is amazing with her attitude, she is highly experienced. Very open to discuss and guide and super friendly!!

tags: None
review:
Dr.Sangeeta Gomes has been a very good doctor and advisor throughout my wife's pregnancy. She is a good listener and provides great advise to overcome all the fears that someone would have when being pregnant for the first time. Consults with her were precise and to the point and she clearly explains current status and future scenarios. She gives you the option on how you want to plan your delivery. She is approachable and available for emergencies.
My wife had to be rushed to the hospital when her water broke and Dr.Gomes spoke to both of us over the phone right away to understand the situation and to explain to us the next steps. She reassured us that everything would be alright and was at the hospital within the hour.
I would certainly recommend her, the whole journey of pregnancy was very pleasant and stress free for us because of Dr.Sangeeta Gomes.

tags: None
review: We had consulted Dr. Sangeetha Gomes for the delivery of our 2 kids (recent one in the month of April 2016). Being introduced through our relatives, we found Dr Sangeetha Gomes very dynamic, up to date on the medical advancements and capable of striking a pleasant relationship with patients very quickly. She was able to take care of all our doubts and reassure us on the path to delivery at each stage. We are very thankful to the doctor and her team in the clinic, for all the care that we received and the 2 kids to enrich our lives.

tags: None
review:
I visited Dr. Sangeetha Gomes at Motherhood Hospital from the sixth month of my pregnancy. Since then my experience has been quite satisfactory with her till now. At first I was a bit confused about which doctor to choose, but after going through the reviews I decided to visit the doctor. From the first day she was quite friendly and always talks to patient with a smiling face. She is always approachable. She did not prescribe any unnecessary tests to me. I delivered a baby girl at 36th week of my pregnancy and she performed the C section quite smoothly. During my stay at the hospital she personally came to see how I was doing. Moreover she also advised me on prenatal exercises and lactation.

Overall, I am happy with the doctor and my husband and I would like to thank Dr. Sangeetha for our wonderful experience.

tags: None
review: By grace of God we are blessed with a healthy baby boy on 21/3/2016. During my entire pregnancy period Dr. Sangeetha has attended all my health issues very calmly and her advises were really helpful. As she was not available in Motherhood for all the time, we visited  her clinic at HSR layout during some emergency. "Care Clinic" staffs are trained and they paid immediate attention towards us. Dr. Sangeetha was very much cooperative during the delivery time to choose the right hospital looking at our economic condition, also she suggested us couple of options. She completed the whole process without any complication and thus blessed us with a second child after a daughter, we are very thankfull to her. During the entire period we were not worried as we are under supervision of such an experienced  doctor.

tags: None
review:
Hi,
I've known Dr.Sangeeta Gomes since my college days. May it be the problem related to menstural cycle or the problem in bowel movement, her treatment helped me a lot. When we started to try for a baby, I got to know that I had hypothyroid and PCOD, Dr.Sangeeta Gomes started treatment for the same and insisted to get follicular scanning. I conceived in the second month of her treatment. I had spotting on 6th week of my pregnancy, fortunately nothing was wrong as per scan, she treated me to clot the blood and now I'm 3.5 months pregnant. My experience with her has been great. Looking forward to have safe delivery and healthy baby under her guidance.

tags: None
review:
Dr. Sangeeta gomes is a truly experienced gynecologist, i took my pregnancy consultations from her in her clinic itself "Care Clinic" in HSR layout.
She is very humble and listen to problem patiently unlike other doc, Not even once she misguided me towards costly treatments and medicines, my pregnancy under her went super smooth and now m heading towards my due date and is very much likely to have normal delivery.
I would highly recommend dr. Sangeeta to others who are looking for a genuine gynecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After my two miscarriages I was not able to conceive again, then we went to Dr.Sangeeta. She root caused the issue and helped us in conceiving again and maintain a healthy pregnancy. She understood how "precious" this pregnancy was for us and she has taken utmost care. Even with so many complications, I have  delivered the baby normally under her care and guidance.She is the most experienced doctor I have ever met.She is very caring towards her patients.She always had our best interest in her mind that gives a "motherly vibes".I would definitely recommend Dr. Sangeetha to everyone.Thank you Mam for everything‚ù§Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,
review:
I started visiting Dr. sangeeta Gomes in my 8th month of pregnancy as I previously consulting in my hometown and had to come back to bangalore as my husband's wfh was over. We needed a doctor urgently and by luck found sangeeta mams reviews from many previous patients online regarding C section ( as we wanted to opt for C section) . We went on the faith of the reviews and truly found her to be really good in her work. She immediately took me under her wing and guided me throughout the two months. 
I went for C section and her hands were really magic! The whole process of my delivery was so smooth . She brought my Son into this world and i am so thankful to her!! My stitches were also healing rapidly! There was hardly any pain. Even when I consulted her after 2 weeks for follow up, she was kind enough to guide me in how to maintain my health and take care of the stitch. I am Really really grateful to Sangeeta mam and her team!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Great experience as a first timer. I barely waited to be helped when I checked in. 
The staff and Dr. Sangeeta Gomes were all very friendly and helpful. 
I especially loved how Dr.Sangeeta really took her time to explain traditional tricks& approach for normal delivery, 
Minimal scan sessions, medications were timely recommended only if required 
My best experience was when I was in labour and one of sister asked who is the Dr when I mentioned it is Dr Sangeeta she confidently said it is going to be normal delivery then
She closely monitored my situations from start to end and post-delivery visits.
I had a great visit and the doctor‚Äôs demeanour has really put me at ease 
so I highly recommend this clinic.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: ************ ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******** ** *** ***** She is experienced in identifying and diagnosis of the issue. She is straight forward and does not keep the patient waiting. She is on time. Does not prescribe unnecessary medications. Her advice on diet and fitness  will be magical if u follow. Unlike most of the pregnancy experts i have met earlier, she is the only Doctor who reminded me of the Doctor's i used to meet during my younger days. Finally, choosing this Doctor is the best decision of my life. We are now blessed with a baby boy. Thank you for the hands which helped my baby come into this world.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are forever thankful and grateful to Sangeetha Mam for our little angel üòä!!! We visited Sangeetha mam from early on our pregnancy planning. Since then and through out the pregnancy she has been so wonderful and supportive. She is always very calm and explains things with patience. Whenever we visited her we came back worry free and with a smile due to her positive attitude and guidance. The care clinic staff is also very supportive and proactive.We would recommend Sangeetha mam to everyone for a smooth pregnancy journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a past history of a loss due to a doctor's negligence and I knew that my next pregnancy will be high-risk. I wanted to be pregnant again and I feel so blessed that I found  Dr Sangeeta. Sangeeta ma'am is very experienced in handling high-risk pregnancies and when I had some complications in the middle of my pregnancy, she gave me the right treatment. She was always confident that she won't let me suffer another loss. I recently delivered a baby girl under her hands and me and my family are so thankful for her constant support and guidance. She is a great Doctor and very friendly to her patients. I would recommend every pregnant women to consult her for a smooth pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been struggling due to infertility since last 3 years and contacted many well known hospitals and wasted much energy and money.Finally I decided to meet Sangeeta mam after reading the reviews, and I already knew her as she has done my mother surgery few years back. In the first visit itself she got to know what was the issue with me and suggested me few meditation and ask me to contact back after 3 months, I followed whatever she suggested and with god's grace I convinced after 2 months 'Nautrally' which was like a dream come true.I am currently 3 months pregnant and she is handling my pregnancy very smoothly and I know I am in safe hands. She is very friendly and treats her patients like her daughter.Now a days Hospitals make good money if you consult them for infertilty, as theses are very common in Bangalore but She is not someone who is back of money.In one line I can say"God works through her".May this review be helpful for those who is struggling to convinve.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Before consulting to Dr Sangeetha Gomes, I checked her on Google and found very good reviews comments given by patients then I met with Dr Sangeetha and started my journey of pregnancy. During my pregnancy I had some complications which was handled by Dr smoothly.In mid of my pregnancy covid came but she kept all precautions. My delivery was through c-section and we got blessed with a baby boy. And she also help in breastfeeding. But Dr should share her personal no when 32 weeks started like other Dr of Bangalore shares.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** ********* ** ** ***** * **** **** ****** *I had consulted her for the initial days of my pregnancy.
She took utmost care to understand my concerns at every consultation.Even in this pandemic situation whenever I had any concern I was able to reach her through the hospital or the Hsr clinic as well.By God's grace and her timely treatment we are blessed with a baby boy. Highly recommended with out any doubt .Also,a great job is done by her team of nurses who actually follow up any issue pre and post delivery.Thank you Dr Sangeetha and Team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We were looking for the good gynaecologist near by our area after doing some short of googling we found Dr Sangeeta Gomes and visited motherhood hospital to meet her.
She is very friendly and explains things very nicely the best thing what we feel about her is simplifying the problem very easily and suggesting the very simple things to come out from the problem.
During covid situation also she did the excellent job and help us during delivery for that we are very thankful for her.
After delivery also we are consulting with her only and have recommended couple of people also.

We have so many things to say because our journey is very long and because of her help we got precious gift of god...so very big thanks to Dr Sangeeta Gomes from our family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Sangeeta Gomes was my gynaecologist even before my pregnancy. I felt very comfortable to continue consulting with her during my pregnancy. She is an exceptional doctor who gave timely advice on every emergency and her suggestions made my pregnancy really smooth even during the tough times of covid-19. Her attention and dedication was the same high level prior to my delivery and post delivery as well. Her nursing staff at care clinic are also very friendly and supportive. They always kept in touch to know the baby's and mother's health post delivery.I would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

But that was right decision which we made. She always suggest you proper guideline , very practical and make you feel comfortable in all situations.The most trusted gynaecologist for pregnancy.  My 9 months journey was smooth becoz of her.  I am blessed with healthy baby girl with the doctor support

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,

When opportunity meets Dr.Sangeetha Mam ..Have started consulting her for pregnancy issues , she is very caring , well  experienced (we can feel that in every visit ) . tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Sangeeta madam is very caring and she took care of my wife from the first day when we visited her in the care clinic at HSR. We are very blessed that we got her for our first baby delivery and she is still taking care of my wife very carefully. She shows confidence and provide utmost comfort even in difficult conditions. I will recommend her to everyone. Madam also helped us in holding the baby for breast feeding as well she providenatural home remedies to get rid of strechmark post deliveries.  Post surgery my wife was very active and able to get up and move around on the very next day. The surgery was done very peacefully and sisters from care clinic following up regularly on the patient and the baby's condition.

tags: Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I was visiting this hospital for 3 long years now. I had a over bleeding issue for which multiple treatments were opted and tried. Doctor  Sangeetha Gomes was patient enough through out the treatment and have patiently answered all my questions through out the journey. I finally ended up having a vaginal surgery. I was initially hesitant and was full of questions, but,  the doctor Sangeetha Gomes helped me come out of all the apprehensions and gave me the strength to move ahead. The hospitality and nursing care of the hospital can never be forgotten. Their prompt response and assistance helped in my recovery process . Highly recommend Hospital

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Being salaried class, we have to switch cities often , and every time the biggest challenge is to find a good doctor nearby. I found Dr. Sangeeta Comes through online search and reviews.

And let me tell you , she is my best find till date. She is very friendly, straightforward, as in will tell you the exact problem and if there is any solution , how much time we can wait to conceive. She is very quick in diagnosis and decision making on required action to be taken. I initially visited her for my thyroid and initial pregnancy tests. She very rightly guided me and was always available in case of emergency. I had some small complications in my pregnancy, but will writing this review, I am looking and smiling at my bundle of joy, my baby.

I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We were in a search of a good gynoclogist, And we found Dr Sangeetha Gomes(Care Clinic) through Procto based on the reviews.Have been consulting Dr Sangeetha from past 6 months for PCOD and pregnancy related issues, she has been very helpful in diagnosing the problems and helped us in every stage. She is very friendly and patiently listens to our concerns. Was able to conceive naturally within 6 months, I strongly recommend Dr Sangeetha for pregency related issues, Special thanks to the Nurses who are very supportive and caring. Thank you so much..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We had a pregnancy issue and one of our friend suggested us to consult  Dr Sangeeta Gomes. We googled and consulted a lot about other doctors and found she is the one we should check with. We consulted   with Dr. Sangeeta before and throughout my pregnancy and continued for follow ups as well. She and her team was very helpful and suggested us on timely basis. extremely approachable and practical. I am a first time mom, my pre and post pregnancy went very smoothly with right guidance of Dr.Sangeeta. There was few instances where we were worried and she calmed us down with few practical examples and suggestions to take it forward. I'm a mother of a beautiful son now :) .
With my practical experience, I will definitely recommend to consult Dr.Sangeeta to others.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: My baby was delivered on February 2019 by Dr Sangeeta Gomes. It was a cesarean as my fluid lowers went low after trying for normal. It was a smooth journey with Dr guiding us throughout on the dos and don‚Äôts. She would suggest traditional and authentic ways of staying fit throughout the journey. There were a few lows in between and doctor guided us all along and was patient enough to answer our queries. Make sure you jot down the questions to be asked before the consultation as she is busy with a lot of patients in the queue. It was my first baby and my overall experience was great. Post pregnancy as well doctor is available to answer your queries. She is approachable and answers all your queries. Also her warm and friendly nature will make you more comfortable. Further, her staff at Care Clinic is also very friendly. I recommend Dr Sangeeta Gomes to all pregnant woman. Happy delivery!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I am visiting Dr. Sangeetha Gomes for my pregnancy. Firstly, she is a very warm person who takes care to put you at ease, which is truly remarkable. She listens patiently to even the smallest concerns and provides excellent advise. Her vast experience is evident in her patient handling. I am extremely happy that I started consulting with her and hope to have a great experience henceforth too. I would highly recommend anyone looking for routine pregnancy consultation/ high risk pregnancy/infertility evaluation to consult her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
First off a big Thanks from our whole family.  

I want to share the experience i had during the course of pregnancy and delivery.

I must tell that after having two normal deliveries in the US, Dr. Sangeetha made me felt at ease all 9 months.  She is very confident, soft spoken, friendly and very comforting
at all times we met her.  Few of my friends suggested me to go for other doctors but I was really impressed by her way she made me comfortable.  
She is very proactive in terms of checking the health of the baby and mother and never compromises on that front which is a very impressive quality I noticed. 

During the delivery - the instructions given by her to the nurses at all times were very crisp and clear, they were all time alert and did not have any sort of confusion. 
Dr Sangeetha, arrived just on time and made it quick and easy on us. 

I would strongly recommend her and give her a 10/10. 

Sabiha Ahmed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
This is a heartfelt thank you to Dr Sangeeta for the very positive maternity, labor and delivery experience that we had. Our son was born through normal delivery without any complications. Throughout the maternity phase, she has been very clear with her communication. Her calm, composed attitude throughout the 9 months consultation helped us first-time expecting parents stay relaxed. She told us earlier on that we were very favorable for normal delivery and that the labor would be for short and smooth. That is what exactly happened. She was even very supportive when we told her that we would like to wait for natural labor to begin instead of going for induction. Post-delivery as well, there was regular follow-ups from her team to check if I and the baby are doing okay.

I would strongly recommend Dr Sangeeta to all expecting parents. So glad we made the right choice when it came to the happiest experience of our life!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: i know her earlier itself ... she is the one who treated me for the infertility issues (due to the pcod) and I have delivered a healthy boy baby, he is now 5 years old .. I am very thankful to her... after my first child I had 3 miscarriages and i would say only bcoz of her treatment 4th time I delivered a very healthy baby. For now I have severe vaginal infection for which she is treating me. This infection started since November and I have been to 2 gynaecologists but of no use and hence I became too stressful mentally and physically... my immunity level is very poor... by googling i found her again.... so the next moment I went to her.. my mind says she could only cure me for sure....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr Saneeta Gomes for our pregnancy. She explains everything clearly with simple words. From the first month of pregnancy to post delivery she guided us very well.Pregnancy comes with lots of questions, problems and anxiety. On top of that eveybody from friends to  family comes up with scary stories about pregnancy. This builds lots of pressure for first time pregnats.Dr answered all our questions with such simplicity and gave us hope. Her positive attitude helped us to cope with all the pressure and anxiety during pregnancy. During delivery she and her staff managed everything excellently. Dr guided the entire staff and made sure everything goes well and on time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would like to thanks Dr Sangeetha  for the wonderful care she and her staffs have taken during the course of my pregnancy journey. Dr Sangeetha has a lovely  combination of professionalism  and caring and i appreciate it very much ..I had visited Dr sangeetha during my 5 months of pregnancy with some unawared complications .Ma'am held my hands and drove me safely from those and now  i am blessed with a beautiful  girl.Thank you for everything you have done for me and i am blessed to have found a doctor like you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor barely spent 10 minutes with me. I had gone fore pre-pregnancy planning consulting. She gave me a long list of tests without really explaining why they were absolutely required, she seems to be in a hurry to attend to other patients. When I went to get those done, turned out that they were really really expensive. ***** ************* ***** ***** * ******** **** ****** *** ** **** **** ********** *********** *** *** **** **** ******* **** **** *********** **** * ****** ************ ******************* I was charged more than what was mentioned on Practo as a first time consulting fee too.
In addition it was honestly not a very pleasant experience meeting either.
Bottom line I was really unhappy and surely wouldn't recommend.
This was absolutely just my personal experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sangeeta Gomes was very friendly and supportive. Even though i started consulting her in the middle of my pregnancy she guided me well all throughout. In my 7th week, i had severe diarrhoea and vomitings, and my AFI went to very low to 8.7 cm from 18. She immediately took proper attention and suggested us to get admitted, and with proper care and her daily consulting and guidance, i recovered and got back to normal. She knew that we were travelling to our hometown for the delivery, and still she took care of me well, and made sure, we traveled to my hometown on time after being fit. The best experience i ever had consulting a doctor so far. I suggest you all to consult this doctor for any pregnancy related issues or guidance based on my wonderful experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I moved from Delhi to Bangalore when I was 2 months pregnant and was in a dire need of a good gyno to consult to. I came to know about Dr. Sangeeta and in the first visit itself, I was sure that I have landed at the right place.
She guided me very well during entire pregnancy, explaining everything and being sweet-strict about certain things. Her experience in the feild is immense and so are her home remedies.
I never consulted any other doctor after meeting Dr. Sangeeta and am very satisfied with her guidance and care with which my delivery was handled. She never let me feel nervous though it was my first delivery and that too c section.
Today I am a proud mother of a 1.5 month old daughter and still prefer to consult Dr. Sangeeta even for baby issues.
I consider myself lucky to have met Dr. Sangeeta.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Met Dr Sangeetha for 2nd pregnancy.
*** ** *** **** ****** ** ***** *** ********* *** ********* ** **** ***** ** ******** She guided us through the entire pregnancy period and her suggestion helped us. She told us many home/remedies which helped. One thing I really appreciate/like about her is that she won't give medicine for everything and will suggest you to try natural things. My first kid was born using vaccum. She made sure and kept assuring us that we won't use vacuum as it is unsafe. And finally I had a normal delivery without vaccum. Thanks to Doctor for guiding us. She is very friendly. She always has a smile on her face which makes you very comfortable. One more positive point is in the morning she is available in Motherhood and evening at her clinic. So we don't have to wait for next day.And you can contact her on WhatsApp.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We were blessed with baby boy and a baby girl on August 22, 2018. I have been suggested cervical stitches in initial months and I was not that much interested to go with it. I consulted Sangeetha Gomes as 2nd opinion and I got delivered without any stitches under her supervision. She suggested complete bed rest and put me under rigorous medication which helped me to go through the pregnancy. She is a doctor in this modern world but at the same time suggests grand mother traditions and ideas in making pregnancy successful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We blessed with our 1st child on 3rd September here in Motherhood Sarjapura. Sangeeta Ma'am helped us from starting till post delivery. She was available on Phone for any query as it was our 1st child and every week we had some new query and needed help. Her staff member were also much supportive. 
Dr. is very much supportive and a lady with Indian values. She goes out of her way to help her patient. 
The experience with motherhood was great. The staff and team is good. However for the normal visit we used to visit HSR clinic as both are equidistant from our residence.  
Thanks Dr. bringing such a joy to our life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
My wife delivered a healthy baby boy on the 25th October 2018 here at Motherhood hospital, Sarjapur road. I am so grateful to Dr. Sangeeta Gomes for helping her with the delivery. My wife got a normal delivery, It was Dr.Sangeetha Gomes who encouraged her to stick to normal delivery and made sure her delivery went smoothly. I must credit and appreciate the staff members and the nurses who supported her throughout her labor. The care and compassion post delivery has also been excellent.

Indeed the entire experience for us at Motherhood hospital has been very pleasant, exciting and joyful. I thank once again the entire staff and nurses at Motherhood hospital and at Care clinic, specially Dr.Sangeeta Gomes for bringing such joy in our life :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Exactly 9months back we went to meet doctor. Sangeetha mam on my sister in law recommendation,we explained our infertility problem to her,she received well and understand our problem and make us comfortable and she gave us a hope. And she diagnosed our problem with in a few days and she started her treatment in a simple and elaborated manner, she explained the treatment. for two months she treated us on next month we are very happy to hear that good news,now i am 7th month pregnant we are visiting doctor regularly and getting advises and treatment with out missing.
I strongly recommend her for any gynecology and infertility problems her treatment is very simple and her diagnosis is very perfect.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My sister (54 years) was suffering from frequent urination issue from last 6 months, we consulted many general physician and urologist in sakra, urologist recommend TOT operation, Dr. Gomes identified the issue in seconds and had given medication for 2 months, my sister recovered in one month and doctor also suggested not go for the operation as it has many side effects. Dr. Gomes ** **** ************* *** explained the issue clearly, she was bang on target in diagnosing the issue and prescribing proper medicines. Thank you for your help Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: After meeting so many doctors in Bangalore and native she is the only one who diagnosed my condition ********** Her methods are simple and straight forward with minimal medications. From day 1 she explained us a clear cut plan and followed it till the end. Being an ivf pregnancy,  ectopic once and with gestational diabetes, our journey was tough and challenging. At the time of 34 weeks our baby's heartbeat was high and she did an emergency c section at the right time. Since a pre term baby he was in NICU for 12 days, but doctor informed us well in advance about the ivf pregnancies and took all precautions to minimize his stay. Throughout the journey, her expertise, support, love and guidance helped us overcome the obstacles with courage and confidence.  Meeting Dr is the best thing that had happened in our lives. Our sincere thanks to the doctor for making our lives beautiful once again.

review: With pleasure I recommend Dr Sangeeta for her expertise in handling complicated pregnancy and multiple births. And is abreast with the latest techniques in gynec treatment and prescribes treatment course on case to case basis, rather than same course for all. Considering all complications that I had she advised against circulage which is mandated for twin pregnancies. This averted preterm delivery due to infection. Her involvement dies not end with delivery as she also meticulous about the  post delivery follow ups to ensure that her patient is fully recovered. Her clinic at hsr  has a pleasant ambience and houses well trained team of nurses for interventions ad needed. Highly recommended.

review:
We got in touch with Dr. Sangeetha Gomes by referring reviews and feedbacks on Parcto and Google. I must say that this was one of the best decisions we had taken in terms of doctor selection. She has always been able to help us relate any issues with real world examples from her experience and has advised us on next steps which are minimal, yet effective and most importantly pocket friendly. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: We went to Motherhood hospital after getting positive result in home pregnancy test to consult Dr.Sangeeta Gomes.The pre checkup was done by the nurse such as weight and BP. To our surprise, they also wrote all the test names in the prescription and the list of tablets to start from(yes, even before consultation). *** **** ** ** ** ****** ********** ******** ** **** ** **** ******* Then we went to consult the doctor after 20-30 mins wait time and she didn't even ask about home test or tried to identify if my wife is pregnant. She just suggested few precautions to take for next few weeks and kept asking us if you have any questions? She then asked us to come after 15 days for scan (again, blood test is yet to be taken and still no confirmation on my pregnancy from doctor). the report took 2 days to come which we took it to doctor expecting atleast now she will confirm. once again, to our surprise she asked us why did you come now and you should have come directly after getting scan results. Not so great experience with Motherhood!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Prenatal Checkup,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
I visited Dr. Sangeeta in first month of my first pregnancy and continued with her till my delivery. We were referred to her by a known doctor of us. We are satisfied with her treatment. She tries to communicate in patients mother tongue for better understanding.
Dr had a very systematic approach towards my entire journey. She is very experienced and understands the signals quite early. 
Assessing the situation, she used to suggest the intake of diet and exercises for normal delivery.  Till last minute it was good to go with normal delivery, but I didn't get pains even on 40th week. April 16th was the expected delivery as per the previous scan and Dr suggested to wait till 14th April for pains and get the scan on 14th. In report it showed baby weight as 3.7 kilos and a loop of the cord to neck. So Dr suggested us to go with C-Sec which is safe for both me and baby to avoid any sort of complications especially during lock-down time. She asked to join by night so that she can operate on next day early hrs to avoid any sort of infections(This shows how much she cares about mother and baby). Post delivery also her suggestions were very good. She takes utmost care and avoids any sort of risk (she will not let us go unnecessarily even for medicine unless until its very imp as its corona time). 

We are very happy with the doctor and treatment. I would strongly recommend her for pregnancy related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We were trying from past 2 years and were having a hard time in conceiving. We tried visiting some of the best doctors in Bangalore and still no luck. Then we heard about Dr. Sangeeta Gomes and decided to consult her. I guess it was the best decision we made after a while. Doctor listened to all our past treatments very carefully and asked both of us to go for the basic tests again. She then explained us the treatment process in detail and started with medicines to fill in the gap and made us completely healthy and advised a good diet and sleeping plan. She then started medicines for egg development and after 2-3 cycles my wife conceived. We have now completed 3 months and both mother and fetus development are doing good. The doctor is taking good care and prescribing all the required meds and scans on time. She is really a daughter of god for us and brought us out of a very bad nightmare. We could not ask for anything more and hope to have a good delivery with her blessings. Thanks a lot madam for all of your effort and guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Few months back, I visited another doctor as we are planning for kids. That doctor did some preliminary tests and found that I have a ovarian endometriosis. We visited the doctor for 2 months but she did not even gave any medicine. She suggested surgery to treat my endometriosis. I was very worried as the doctor can not guarantee 100% recovery of my endometriosis problem even with the surgery. But as per the suggestion of my friends and family, decided to go for 2nd opinion.
 This time I was very care full in selecting my doctor. After going through the reviews, I decided to consult Dr Sangeetha. She has gone through all my reports and listened to my problem. She assured us that I need not take Surgery for the cyst size I have. Also she educated us with the risks that will arise if I take surgery. She is very friendly and comforting. She gave some medication for me to get pregnant successfully. At the same time, she gave medication to treat my cyst. Within one month I conceived and I can even see that my cyst size is getting reduced. Now I'm Healthy and happy. Thank you so much Doctor!!! 
You can go to Dr Sangeetha for any Gynic or pregnancy issues without any doubt. I strongly recommend her. One bonus point is she knows many languages. You can comfortably express your problems in your mother tongue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited doctor after two failed IUI at a clinic in HSR.  All mine and husband‚Äôs report were normal. Not  a single apparent problem in any of those but still we weren‚Äôt conceiving. The previous IUI doc didn‚Äôt tell any apparent problem neither did she do any diagnosis after failed first IUI. The second one failed again.  I then decided to go to Dr Sangeeta Gomes for further consultation. She saw the reports and told everything was normal and the only problem which she could think might be related to tubal obstruction.  She gave me inj for 15 days and monitored me closely for the month. With help from her excellent guidance I conceived the same month. It was such a relief from the mental and physical trauma that we were undergoing. I am on my fourth month of pregnancy. She explains everything very nicely. She was bit particular abt diet in the first 3 months and it turned out to be good. She once noticed that I was wearing heels and asked me to change to flats. Which doctor notices such small things ‚Ä¶that too outside her clinic. She doesn‚Äôt  prescribe any extra test or medicines which is such a relief in this city. Most of the doc bill you before consultation but not her. On many visits she didn‚Äôt charge also. The doc has a wonderful grip over languages  and its very easy to have conversation with her. I Hope my remaining pregnancy goes smooth and problem free under her.

I would certainly  recommend  her to anyone as she is the best gynecologist we ever met... thanks you so much Dr. For making us proud parents.

tags: None

We never had to wait long to see her and she took time over every consultation. She was very supportive and comforting during the delivery itself at 2:00 AM! Will recommend her to everyone.

tags: None

God Bless...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Thanks to Dr. Sangeetha for being with us from starting of our Pregnancy journey.Right from beginning,she advised us to take appropriate meals for healthy baby and normal delivery.Even with slight complications,our pregnancy involved minimal medicines and we delivered baby normally in October '2022.She suggested us specific meals, specific exercises during 8th month which made normal delivery achievable in 2 hrs.Thanks for the guidance Dr Sangeeta and being there just a whatsapp message away if we need any advise on emergency.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We took appointment for my wife with Dr Sangeeta Gomes 
after seeing practo reviews and feedback.
The examination which is an important part for the diagnosis,the prescription and the lab test requisition was done by another doctor with whom  she dint take an appointment. 
After waiting for more than 1 hour Dr Sangeetha arrived. She dint spend time to examine her.She just went through the medicines prescribed by the other doctor and asked me her take it.
Not at all happy with this method of consultation.
If the main doctor don't have time don't give appointment to the patients.
We have option to meet other doctors .

tags: Wait time,
review: I went for irregular periods but doctor did not listen to me much. She just gave me medicine and asked me to visit after a month. She was not at all interested to listen that what I wanted to tell her which I really did not like atleast she could listen what I wanted to tell. I have shown her one and a half year old report of some other doctor and she has given me medicine based on those report. * **** ** *** *** * **** ***** ****** ******* All I wanted to tell her that I had done that ultrasound during my period *** ****** ******* *** *** **** **** **** **** **** *** **** *** **** ********** ***** *** she did not give me a chance to speak, she was more interested to check next patient.

tags: None
review:
We have been consulting Dr. Sangeeta Gomes for over a year now and it's been a long arduous journey, but Dr. Sangeeta made it extremely comfortable. We read up¬†lot of stuff over the internet and would go with a bunch of questions to her. ** ***** *** **** ************* * instantly rejecting incorrect facts and patiently answering pertinent queries. Her jolly demeanor provided calm to our nervous souls.¬†Dr. Sangeeta has been very helpful in guiding us in the right direction and to take some critical decisions in timely manner.

The staff at care clinic is also very friendly and supportive.¬†The only negative we face is that we arent able to call her directly for offline questions and have to reach her through the staff which is difficult to do. Otherwise it's been a very pleasant and homely experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: We visited Dr. Sangeeta when i conceived my second baby. i and my husband became confident to choose her for my delivery right after the first visit. She was always friendly and approachable at any time. In my last trimester my baby gained good weight, so she advised diet to keep the weight in control so that it doesn't become difficult for normal delivery. On the delivery day she came early in the morning and encouraged me during my pains to deliver normally only. And because of her i had a quick safe delivery.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Happy with Doctor friendliness, Explanation of the health issue, Treatment satisfaction, Value for money

We have a wonderful experience. The journey was all throughout so beautiful and relaxing. The doctor always had a smile on her face with positive attitude. All our problems and apprehensions vanished by just talking to her. A good human being.
Knows Bengali very well for all type of communication which helped us a lot to clarify our concern and suggestion. 
Congratulation and best of luck Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
It was a great journey with Sangeeta Mam. We went to Mam from our second month of pregnancy on Care Clinic. Mam is very friendly in nature. we felt very much comfortable to discuss any issue with mam. Mam suggested what are the test plus scan required to do. I can tell whole of our pregnancy time Mam was like one of my family member who was guiding us what need to do and not.  All the necessary food diet , some of proper exercise she told to follow.
We are very much happy with our new baby girl. Our last 2-3 week delivery time she was guiding properly how to take care mother and baby* *** *** *** ****** **** ** *** *** ********* * ****** ************ ** ********* **** ********* *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** *** ****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,
review: We have consulted Dr. Sangeeta Gomes extensively during the past few years. She is very methodical and meticulous in her approach to diagnosis and treatment of our issues. She explains her medical approach in detail and this is backed by her extensive experience. She is very personable and patiently explains all the details for the tests and treatment. We never hesitate to ask our questions and we have gone to her with the most basic of questions and she has always put our minds at rest **** *** ********* *** *********** There were times during the road to pregnancy when we were dejected, but her positive attitude and calmness have brought positivity to oue journey. We would heartily recommend her to couples who are trying to get pregnant as she is very experienced and sensitive in handling her patients. Her staff at CARE Clinic in HSR has been very helpful as well, they have helped us in getting touch with her during emergencies and helping with medication along the journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: After having 2 times of miscarriage and a multiple visit to multiple gynecologist we were so disheartened, luckily by God grace we found Sangeeta Maam and just within 4 month of treatment I conceived and now blessed with a healthy baby boy.She is so down to earth she will make you so much comfortable I alway felt her as a family member because of her personality and the comfort she gave to me, my pregnancy journey was so much smooth all credit goes to Ma'am,I strongly recommend Sangeeta Ma'am to all those ppl who are looking for good gynecologist with pregnancy Complications she is really good with her job by your 1visit only you will realise because of the positivity she gave to her all patients,Thank you Ma'am for everything

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: ** ********* ***** ** *** ** *** ****** ****** * **** **** ****I had a miscarriage earlier due to cervical incompetence. This time she took a very good care of me. Considering my condition she prescribed the correct medication and diet throughout my pregnancy.  At 13 weeks I had cervical cerclage and later I was prescribed bed rest. Dr Sangeetha Gomes was very patient and understanding. She made me comfortable each time I visited her. A big thanks to her for taking good care of me and now I m blessed with baby boy. Even after delivery she and her staff kept track of me and my baby's health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Sangeeta Gomes is a very approachable doctor. After my pregnancy was confirmed she was always available through messages and calls for all my queries. She guided us very well throughout my pregnancy on every aspect. During my delivery phase also she was constantly in touch with the duty doctors at the hospital to follow on the progress.

We have been very happy with the support and guidance we received from her.
