tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
We have been consulting Dr Sangeeta Gomes since last one year. Before our successful pregnancy, we had encountered two miscarriages - thanks for her proper medical care and guidance. 

During pregnancy, I had the condition of complete placenta previa however under her guidance, the situation was well taken care and no unpleasant surprises were encountered. 

We are blessed with a boy who is healthy. The baby was delivered by C-section in Fortis where she is a visiting consulting doctor. The Doctor ensured to have regular updates from the hospital doctors and staff on my and my baby's medical condition. 

On a personal note, she is friendly, understanding and supportive.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
After moving from Delhi recently we were searching for a good gynecologist in Bangalore. On searching the internet we found a lot of recommendations for Dr. Sangeetha Gomes. My first visit to her was related to UTI, post which upon discussion me and my husband talked with her about us trying for a baby for a long time and that we had got IVF also done once before which was not successful. She was very open on discussions and a very positive towards helping us. With only some medicines prescribed by her our reports started showing positive results and in the first round of IUI itself I got pregnant. She was the only confident person throughout our process about the results being positive. 
We are grateful to her for being a part of our journey. 
I highly recommend her as she is very open to talk to and a very positive person.

tags: None
review:
We were eagerly waiting for our pregnancy from a while and visited Dr Sangeetha ghomes
for the same,with her treatment within a month i got confirmed and we are very happy to hear the news.
Am having some complications in my pregnancy due to previous health issues,we got good support and guidance from her,The best part about her is that whenever we are in panic situation, she gives strong advises in such a way that it gives good hope for us,she personally calls us and checks our health conditions.

tags: None
review:
Dr.Sangeetha Gomes is very experienced doctor & knows how to handle each & every cases.she is very cool & calm while handling the cases.she gives genuine advice. I have consulted her fr my first pregnancy. it was horrible, I hd threatened abortion in 6 wks & finally delivered a healthy boy baby that to 3.75kg normal..
Now I am consulting same doctor fr my second pregnancy. .But now I'm hvng gestational diabetes. I was so scared about this but she cleared all my fears & clarified all doubts. now  7mnths im hoping for the best. Thank you so much doctor fr such a good & best treatment. ..

tags: None
review: We had visited Doctor Sangeeta Gomes in her Care Clinic HSR Layout for a second opinion for a pregnancy related complication, and thereafter we had continued with Dr. Sangeeta in Motherhood hospital Sarjapur for pre and post natal treatment. Dr. gave us right advice to overcome the complication, and my pregnancy went well. In fact we ended up with delivering a normal healthy child through normal vaginal delivery. Dr. Sangeeta and Motherhood team had always encouraged for normal delivery and direct breast feeding. I am quite happy and satisfied that I chose Dr. Sangeeta and Motherhood hospital, and would certainly recommend the same to my family and friends.

tags: None
review:
Hi, myself Anusandeep. I know Dr.Sangeetha Gomes from my school days. My journey from many years has been really smooth under her consultation. She is having very much patience,humble & listens to you calmly.
I had a PCOD problem due to which I had some difficulty in conceiving. After taking proper medication from her i conceived, after that she suggested me to undergo some tests & scanning in which everything was normal.
During my 28th week of pregnancy i had a short cervix, where doctor advised me to take a complete bed rest and she started giving me injections & medicines. With the help of her guidance & regular check ups & proper scanning everything came to be normal.
On may 12th 2016 I delivered a baby boy in Motherhood hospital. I would like to convey my sincere regards & thanks to her

tags: None
review:
Dr Sangeetha Gomes is very good &very experienced doctor. Its hard to find such doctors nowadays. I hd problem fr my frst baby den my sister suggest to consult this doctor..Aftr consulting her I hd cleared all my problems.I hd my first baby boy with 3.75 kg normal delivery @ St.pilomeno's hospital.. 
Now I'm consulting same doctor fr my second pregnancy now im diabetic.im taking insulin. I hope I'll be normal & I'll get best treatment. .I suggest to all my family members like my Co sisters, my cousin's &my friends to consult Dr.Sangeetha Gomes for the best treatment. ..Thnk u ma..I'm very happy & I'm blessed to find such doctor like you...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted Dr. Sangeetha Gomes for our first pregnancy and she made it a great experience. Throughout, the medication and her advice helped us at each and evey step. She was approachable and used to listen to us patiently and answer all our queries in a personalised way. She speaks many languages and interacted with us in our language making it even more easy for us to relate and communicate. She always used to give us a lot of confidence.We were on our way to have a normal delivery but a little early than the due date it had to be a C-section. The doctor helped us a lot in making the decision and she ensured the delivery experience was smooth without panic. Thanks to the doctor and I will highly recommend her anytime.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.sangeeta gomes has vast experience in handling preganancy complications. I visited her last year when I was in my first trimester referred by one of my friend. She has very good hold on traditional & modern methods to guide her patients. The focus is on minimal scanning and more attention to diet and wellbeing. She even engaged with us on couple counseling when needed and devoted dedicated time in managing my pregnancy unlike many other doctors who give very less time to their patients. She meticulously monitored baby weight and kept the same in check through diet and prevented possible gestational diabetes. She is accessible enough for doubts and the nurses in her clinic treated me like family. Most importantly she prepared my mind and body for a smooth labor. Both me and baby are in ideal weight and we are grateful for soliciting her services.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: We consulted Dr Sangeetha Gomes for my pregnancy and I'm more than happy to have her as my doctor. We welcomed healthy baby boy through normal delivery because of her. Dr is very friendly in nature and won't suggest any unnecessary treatment and medication and always suggests home remedies for healthy pregnancy and delivery. She is very experienced in identifying and diagnosing any issue and clearly explains all the points related to the treatment. I would definitely recommend her and thank her from bottom of my heart

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My always go-to-Gynec-doc in town! * ***** *** *** ** *** **** ***** ****** ** ***** I have consulted her since last 1 year. My bond with doctor has increased during my pregnancy. She is very friendly, supportive and motivates. I suffer with anxiety when it comes anything related to my health. From the very first consultation, the conversation happened with her is always like how I talk to my mom. Her amicable nature, the way she dealt, created a bond, I believe that helped my anxiety.  Now, i am blessed with Baby girl. I would definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: While selecting gynecologist for my pregnancy I was looking for the doctor who tries for  normal delivery and believe in traditional methods. She is a very straight forward person. During my visits she never did false promises for normal delivery instead she suggested actions to be done to achieve it. Due to some complications at the end moment  I had to undergo C-section but I must say that doctor tried her best to do normal delivery. I will appreciate her staff at care clinic as post delivery they were continuously in touch with me to take the status of my health and updating the doctor and when needed doctor also spoke to us. only one issue I can think of : unable to access doctor directly over mobile as she refrain herself from accessing mobile.  Rest all looks good. Thanks Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Hi all.. I am blessed with healthy baby boy and the reason is Dr.  sangeetha gomes. I have been consulting her since last 4 years.. .For both my pregnancies I was under her consultation , the reason is.**** ********* ** ****** *** *** ********** *** ********** ***** ************ she is very liable through her profession ,as during this pandemic also she took well care of her patient through online video consultation. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review: I found Dr. Sangeeta's reference online and consulted her  throughout my pregnancy. There were some complications towards the end which led to an LSCS. Sangeeta mam guided us extremely well at every step suggesting the best possible course of action, and always answered all our queries patiently despite her busy schedule. *** ** * **** ************* *** experienced doctor and we have grown to trust her completely. I'll definitely recommend her to my family/friends and to anyone looking for a good gynecologist/obstetrician around HSR/Sarjapur area. The nurses at Care clinic are also very friendly and helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We approached Dr.Sangeeta after reading great reviews about her and we were not disappointed. She was with us in our baby journey since the beginning and her experience helped us a lot when we had to travel overseas while pregnant during the early days. She advised on how to take care of myself throughout the journey and the medicines she prescribed made sure both baby and I were healthy. She is extremely ************* *** * kind person. She was the only one i trusted with delivering my baby and now blessed with a baby girl. Even after the delivery i received daily calls from her staff checking up on my well being. I still am continuing to visit her because she is like a family now. Highly recommended :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was such a bad experience. She was not letting me explain my issue. She prescribed list of medicines ******* ********* ******** ** ** ****** she said there are so many people waiting outside. I was asking her how to take my tablets and she said she has no time go out and nurse will explain all the things. I paid more than 700 and all she could give was just 6 minutes of time. if she has no time she should not have accepted the appointment. She gave such huge list of no explanation for any of my question. Would never suggest her *** ********* ** ****** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
We had consulted dr sangeeta gomes right from beginning of my pregnancy. everything is preplanned in her clinic. so whenever we visit we get list of scanning, blood test to be done. during next visit we could go with the reports. she speaks quickly, doesn't spend much time with us  during visit but make sure we get all the important information. 

she encouraged us for normal delivery but as my baby was in breech position till 36th week she mentioned we may have to go for surgery if the baby doesn't come to head down position till 37th week

finally the day has arrived and I had surgery as my baby was still in breech position. overall experience with her was good and the staff in her clinic are also friendly and responsive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We consulted Dr. Sangeetha Gomes for our first baby and got a very pleasant experience through out pregnancy and post that as well.
Very approachable and caring . Efficiently handles the complication of any sort during pregnancy and allow us to relax so that we do not panic.
Very calm and polite in nature. She doesn't suggest any unnecessary medicine or diagnosis.
Not much queue in the clinic and a well-trained nursing staff to take care the would be mom.
Blessed with a healthy baby boy under her supervision. Still consulting her as we are very much satisfied with the her treatment.
Highly recommended as Obstetrician and Gynecologist. Already recommended to my friends and colleges.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted Dr.Sangeetha Gomes for Pcod related issues. After 3 years on consultation with another doctor, we decided to visit Dr.Sangeetha by checking some positive reviews in Practo and that turned out to be the BEST decision we ever made. Dr.Sangeetha is very honest and practical with the treatment.She makes sure that no stone is unturned in the line of treatment for best possible results. I was able to conceive naturally within 6 months and I am in my 24th Week of pregnancy now. We are very happy and pleased with the Doctor. we would strongly recommend her for fertility related issues. All the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Sangeeta Gomes is very friendly,¬†always smiling¬†and result oriented Doctor. She explains everything clearly with simple words. In 2 months of consultation with doctor, I became pregnant. I am extremely thankful to Sangeeta mam..I am 6 months pregnant now. My friend recommended Dr Gomes as they also consulted her. They consulted many other doctors but finally with dr Sangeeta's guidance and treatment they welcomed a baby boy.
I was diagonised as pre-diabetic during my early preganacy. She suggested good food habits and fortunately my sugar levels came to normal. We highly recommend Dr. Sangeeta Gomes.

DECISION MAKER

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We were planning for a baby and met Dr. Sangeetha Gomes. She was very friendly and explained clearly the problems and the solutions for the same.  Her treatments are usually super fast and no side effects. She is extremely professional and ensures that end result is met. We got regular calls from the clinic when my wife was pregnant and regular check up  dates were updated and tracked by their staffs. Staff nurses working there are very courteous and very co-operative.  Today we are blessed with a baby boy.  We are grateful to Dr Sangeetha Gomes madam for making this happen. I would recommend to anyone who are planning to conceive to have a general check up or any problem related to pregnancy care.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor Sangeetha Gomes is a highly experienced doctor. I consulted her for my treatment of PCOD so that I can conceive in another 6 months. Doctor was able to identify my problem and provided prompt medication. Within 2 months of treatment, I conceived. My pregnancy was a high risk pregnancy as I had bleeding multiple times in my pregnancy but doctor understood the exact issue and proposed proper care and medication. I m blessed with a baby girl and I am very satisfied with her treatment. Would definitely recommend her to my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We came to know about Dr sangeetha Gomes through Google and Practo reviews. so me and my husband had decided to consult with her. I was located near hoodi, 15 km  away from the hospital. our initial plan to consult with her for 7 months and later, we had decided to go to our hometown for delivery.  But our goodness, the first consultation itself, made us to do delivery with her.Dr Sangeetha gomes is really super cool doctor. she didnt recommend much medicines to me. Her advise on food diet and regular scans was really helpful. which is the main reason for me to deliver normally on April 18th 2019. its helpful for me in postpartum advise aswell.we are happy with baby boy. Thank you doctor for everything. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: For both pregnancies, we consulted doctor Sangeetha but for my second pregnancy,¬†delivery happened under her supervision at Motherhood hospital. Our experience with her is great. She is a wonderful person, down to earth and always cleared any doubts we had. When we talk to her she always made us feel comfortable and that we are in safe hands. When so many people visiting daily it would be difficult to remember each person by name and their details but she remembers everything even when we went after my first delivery after so many months she remembered¬†us.What we like most about her are the recommendations and suggestions she gave which used to remind us about what our parents or grandparents used to say. When we talk to her we always felt that we are talking to a family friend rather than a doctor in a Q&A session.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My family recently shifted to sarjapur and was looking for a gynaecologist.We were driven by the ratings of Dr. sangeeta and went for the treatment. In the first visit doctor was in too hurry. she did not listen to my history past treatment going on and gave us the list of test to be done. We were unhappy but still thought if the ratings are so good she must be good. we went for 4 other consultation and realised she just doesn't have time to listen. Last to last week we went for consultation and she without seeing my file started writing test which were already done by her 2 month back.She never explained why these test are important. for me it is important to get confidence in the doc and after almost 6 consultation i realise dont go by ratings **** *** **** *** *********** ********* *** ****** ** ** ***

review: Sageeta mam is not only a very good doctor but also a good human being who patiently listens to ur health problems and help you advice to overcome it mentally and  medically.I gave birth to my son during my second pregnancy under her guidance.Before it I have undergone one abortion also where my fetal heart beat stopped and got absorbed in the uterus in the ver early 8th week of pregnancy.But she handled it very carefully and within a year I became again pregnant and delivered my baby without any trouble**** *** ******** ******** *** ** *** ** *** **** **** ****** *** *** **** ** ******* ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Sangeeta and staff in Care clinic were supportive throughout my journey. There were few concerns which normally new parents have and those were handled and taken care well. All scan schedule, followup etc were very well managed by the staff. Ma'am was always available on call/WhatsApp for any issues faced (almost 24/7) even a small query were answered or directed to correct person. I wanted my delivery to be NVD and there was no rush from doctor's end wrt C-section. All scenario while attempting NVD were discussed and explained to us along with the possible complications. Dr. Supported us throughout, resolving all our doubts and helping us in making decisions while attempting the delivery. I am glad that everything went well for us. Also, Dr. Has made sure for all the required care is taken post delivery for good recovery of health and mind for new mother. I am very thankful to ma'am and she is strongly recommended for to-be and new mothers.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr.SangeethaGomes is an excellent, caring & personable doctor. Highly recommend! 
I visited  her when i was looking for baby planning and just lost our first child after one day of birth. Also i had problem of gestational diabetes and low blood pressure in previous preganancy. She encouraged me to plan for baby after 6 months with proper guidance while other doctors asked me to wait for 2~3 years. I also had compilcations like early bleeding, gestational diabetes and less baby growth during pregancy and i got utmost care and positivity from her at every stage of the pregnancy.Also appreciate her staff team members on their support during this period.

I am very thankful to her for her support during entire my pregnancy period (pre-pregnancy, delivery and post-delivery consultation).

I strongly recommend Dr.Dr.SangeethaGomes , you can close your eyes and follow her instructions, I am sure you will not regret because you are for sure in safe hand's.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Gynae Problems,Pregnancy Tests,Fertility Treatment,
review: We went to doctor initially for resolving the problem associated with conceiving. We were trying from 5 years but were unsuccessful due to my health issues. However with proper guidance and treatment from the doctor I conceived on Feb 2018. It was a high risk pregnancy due to multiple health issues but With doctors proper prescription, guidance and advice the pregnancy went very smoothly. She got good experience and her confidence brings in more confidence and trust. I totally trusted her and followed her and the result is I delivered a healthy baby girl on Nov 2018. She catches issues very fast and provides the treatment without any delay. The doctor is also very approachable as we can call her assistant any time of the day and the doctor responds immediately. I would definitely refer my friends facing gynec plm to the doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: we came to this care clinic with my cousin Bhargavi Dhanunjaya reference.  my regular checkup by Dr(malathi manipal) and respective  diagnosis center raised a issue(my baby's nuchal fold measurement more at 21 week 4 days),in report they suggested NFT and other scan(its costly one more than 25k), we are confident that in earlier tests(NT and Doppler ) this issue not came.so, we met Dr sangeetha for second opinion. Mam, saw all the reports, suggested that if you have doubt on that report then do it 22 weeks anomaly scan with Good radiologist Shankar(ebisu)  and come with report. we went with report, Dr explained very clearly, she talked with radiologist also and confirmed that no issue. she suggested few missed things by regular Dr like 2nd TT, and good bacteria tablet. we're so thankful to sangeetha mam for clearing my doubts and worries with accurate reports and excellent guidance.

But we are extremely satisfied with Dr Sangeeta, her friendliness. She is carefully listening to all queries and try to answer all of them. I personally like her tips which you can easily do it at home. She had taken care of my wife very well through out the pregnancy. Because of her only the whole pregnancy period went very smooth. Also bcos of her our stay in motherhood was also very good. If you are Dr Sangeeta's patient the staff is giving special attention. She is also monitoring the thing personally. She consoled my wife very nicely. We are blessed with Second baby boy. Thank you Dr for all your help.

tags: Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
My appointment was at 805, I was there in the clinic but it was so crowded and there was no reception visible. No place to sit and no staff in the welcoming area. Finally I needed through the rush and found the reception in some corner not visible from the main entrance. No sign nothing. The staff was busy speaking to the other patients and by the time they finished and got to me another 5 mins passed by 
The staff told me to fill some form and said I need to wait for long as the doc z busy attending other patients and they weren't sure how long it would take. Said half hour to an hour at least. So I decided to leave as it was already too late and I wasn't sure how f long to wait. So I couldn't consult the doc

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was recommended by a friend of mine to consult Dr Sangeeta Gomes. I am really happy that he did the same.It was a pleasure knowing Dr Gomes and I feel privileged that I had the opportunity to see her way of treating patients.She connects to all her patients at personal level and reminds us that the pure and ultimate bond between doctor and patient still exist in this modern world wherein money is what matters the most.I will certainly recommended Dr Gomes to all my friends and relatives and am confident that she will continue doing the great work she is doing currently.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have choosen Dr Sangeeta for pregnancy consultation. I'm consulting her right from 2nd month of pregnancy. She explains everything very crisp and clear. She is very friendly and listens to our questions patiently.
I was diagonised as pre-diabetic during my preganacy. She suggested good food habits and fortunately my sugar levels contained in pre-diabetic and did not shoot up.
Around 8 months my AFI has gone low. She clearly explained the complications with low AFI and made us alert. Finally with her medication AFI levels were back to safe level.
Thanks a zillon doctor for the kind care and your good guidance. And a special thanks to you from our cute little baby too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review:
We came to know about Dr. Sangeetha Gomes from my friend. We met her for the first time once we confirmed my pregnancy and decided she is the right one.
She is very patience on answering my queries and listening to my issues/concerns. She is very friendly and caring throughout my pregnancy, she is always available on mobile in emergencies.
coming to caring.. I must say about the follow-ups, her clinic staff used to call 3 times a day to know about my health condition, once after we consulted with an issue and she followed up on my health post delivery as well.

Thank you for all your caring and support Ma'am! *** *** *** *****!

The clinic is very clean and well maintained. There is no waiting time becoz of appointments. 

Overall , ********* ***  *** *** *** ***** Thank you for everything.

review:
I and my husband consulted Dr Sangeeta Gomes for infertility at care clinic. She is very experienced, professional and friendly. She can understand almost all languages and responds well. She spends enough time with each patient and go through all the reports in detail, clarifies all our doubts. She diagnosed my cyst problem and guided accordingly. Now I am pregnant. She did all the required tests and scans done regularly and prescribing  required meditation. In case of any issues, she is available on phone and suggested accordingly.
Clinic is very clean, staff are very cooperative and polite. Everything properly organized and tracked.
We are very thankful to Dr Sangeeta Gomes for her support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We have been consulting Dr Sangeeta Gomez at Care Clinic right from the start of our pregnancy. We approached her based on the reviews from practo and bang on, it was one rightful decision we made. 
Doctor has vast experience and knowledge and understands each patient and their requirements very well. She pays personal attention to her patients and I always felt safe and confident in her hands. She is incredibly patient and was never tired of answering my long list of questions at each visit. She is fantastic in the labour room and her presence really eased my tension. We would highly recommend Dr Sangeeta Gomez and Care Clinic

Thanks Smitha and Sunil

review: We took an appt with Dr Gomes at Motherhood for 11.30. We arrived at 11 and doc wasn't in. She drove just for me- I guess I was her only patient at the hospital that day. So my feedback is that if you are seeing any doc @Motherhood call in 1 hr before the appt to confirm they're in. Dr very quickly reached diagnosis and prescribed meds. Her treatment seems to be better than the earlier doc I was seeing. No wonder she has so many good reviews online. I am glad I came to her for a second opinion! If I have a grouse I would have liked to have asked her more but couldn't think of anything at the time.

review:
Consulted during pregnancy of :

Best things are:
Minimal number of tests and ultrasound scan.
Minimal medicine and stresses on diet .
Cost of the care and check-up is less by doing away with unnecessary checkup and tests.


In this commercialization of the medical profession her attitude towards proper care with minimal test are commendable. Please keep it up and keep the good work going by being true to the profession.

review:
Hi,

We had the pregnancy checkup and delivery with the Dr.Sangeetha Gomes in the motherhood hospital, it was really a smooth going process with the doctor and we had the time bound delivery in the early monring, i saw the doctor leaving little late the day before the operation but still next day she came on the right time for the c-section. 
Overall the experience was very smooth and clear.
thanks to Dr.Sangeetha Gomes

Regards
Suganya

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted Dr Sangeeta Gomes for my pregnancy. As it is my first child and I stay away from my parents, I asked her many questions and she was always supportive and answered with utmost clarity, care and concern. 

She does not prescribe unnecessarily a lot of medicines. She likes to keep it simple and prescribes tests/medicines only when needed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

We were extremely satisfied and happy with doctor's treatment. After a successful treatment today we blessed with Twin Angels. She and her staffs are very caring. Doctor makes sure that nothing goes wrong by any means. She is very easy to approach all times. I recommend Dr. Sangeetha Gommes for all.
